He is requesting a loan amount of 20,000 INR from Kiva's partner Peoples Forum to purchase wholesale stock of rice, pulses, and snacks, and remodel his shop in order to accommodate a huge stock of eatables.

He is confident that his store will be a great success since there aren't any such small stores in his neighborhood, and housewives often face difficulty when they have to make emergency purchases.

Your loan amount will help support a budding entrepreneur.

loans.use: to purchase wholesale stock of rice, pulses, and snacks, and remodel his shop in order to accommodate a huge stock of eatables.

loans.name: Lalita's Group

texts.en:
Lalita is an industrious lady standing to the extreme left-hand side in the photograph. She is a humble resident of a village of Cuttack distict in Odisha, India.

Lalita is a married lady and has one infant daughter in her care. She enjoys a very contented life with her husband, who is a carpenter, and her only daughter. The fact that concerns her is that she does not have access to toilet at her home. This compels her to walk a long distance in order to defecate in the dense bushes. She does not considers this practice safe and feels the risk of getting bitten by insects and getting affected by infectious diseases.

In order to restore her privacy and promote hygiene and safety, Lalita, along with her fellow group members, is requesting a loan amount of 45,000 INR from Kiva's partner Peoples Forum. She will use her portion of the loan amount to build a well-equipped and sanitized toilet at her home. Having a toilet in her home will increase her convenience, thereby decreasing her difficulties.

Lalita is in dire need of your kind help.

loans.use: to build a well-equipped and sanitized toilet at her home.

loans.name: Rubina's Group

texts.en:
The lady with a smile on her face standing to the extreme right-hand side in the photograph is Rubina. She is a resident of a village in Cuttack district, Odisha, India. She is a homemaker and is a blessed mother of two sons and a daughter. Her husband works in a nearby hotel as a helper and is the sole earner in the family.

With a limited income, after spending a major portion of the share on her children's education, Rubina is hardly left with any kind of savings. This factor has never allowed her to build a toilet in her home.

Therefore, Rubina, along with her other group members, is requesting a loan amount of 45,000 INR from Kiva's partner Peoples Forum. She will use her portion of the loan amount to build a hygienic and a clean toilet at her house and attach the requisite sanitary fittings to it.

She is eagerly awaiting your kind help. The loan amount will help her lead a disease-free, healthy and happy life.

loans.use: to build a hygienic and clean toilet at her house and attach the requisite sanitary fittings to it.

loans.name: Blanca Lilia

texts.es:
Blanca es una mujer pujante, servicial y trabajadora, a sus 51 años de edad, es casada y madre de 3 hijos.

Desde hace 15 años se desempeña en el campo de la confección, prestando el servicio de confección a terceros y a clientes directos, el oficio lo aprendió a través de clases y trabaja sola todos los días, así genera los recursos suficientes para apoyar a su esposo con la carga económica del hogar.

Actualmente se motiva a solicitar el crédito para comprar insumos al por mayor como telas, hilos, resorte, entre otros, esto le permitirá tener material disponible para cumplir con la entrega oportuna de los pedidos que tiene pendientes, logrando fidelizar a sus clientes actuales.

Blanca manifiesta que desea continuar realizando su labor con mucho empeño, pues quiere ampliar su negocio y poder generar oportunidades de empleo, además de garantizar una estabilidad económica para dar a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Blanca is a thriving, attentive, hardworking woman at her age of 51 years. She is married and the mother of three children.

She has worked in the field of tailoring for 15 years, providing the service of tailoring to third parties and to direct clients. She learned the trade through classes and works on her own every day. As such she generates sufficient resources to support her husband with the financial responsibility of the household.

She is motivated to ask for a loan to purchase wholesale supplies such as fabrics, thread, and springs, among others. This will allow her to have material available to carry out timely returns of orders that she has pending, succeeding in building trust with her clients.

Blanca expresses that she hopes to continue carrying out her work with much resolve, and she wants to grow her business and be able to generate employment opportunities in addition to guaranteeing financial stability to give her family a better quality of life.

loans.use: buy wholesale supplies such as fabrics, thread, and springs, among others.

loans.name: Jayashri's Group

texts.en:
The lady standing to the extreme right-hand side in the photograph is Jayashri. She hails from a small village of Cuttack district in Odisha, India. Having a family of five, Jayashri struggles hard as a farmer in order to supplement her family's income. Her husband is a truck driver by profession and is responsible to meet the daily household expenses of the family.

Jayashri, unfortunately, does not have an appropriate toilet in her house, because of which she and her family have to depend upon the open field to attend nature's call. This unsanitary practice makes her vulnerable to crimes, molestation and infectious diseases.

Therefore, Jayashri, along with her other group members, is requesting a loan amount of 45,000 INR from Kiva's partner Peoples Forum. She will use her portion of the loan amount to construct a hygienic and clean toilet at her home. This step will enable her to restore her privacy as well as reduce her medical expenses.

Jayashri is in dire need of your kind help and is eagerly awaiting the same.

loans.use: to construct a hygienic and clean toilet at her home.

loans.name: Binod

texts.en:
Binod is a 41-year-old, married, differently abled person who hails from a small village of Mayurbhanj district, Odisha, India. He is a man with sheer grit and determination. He has never made himself realize that he is different from a normal man.

To meet his household expenses, he has been owning a hardware shop for the last three years. He has one son in his care who is pursuing his studies in a nearby school. Binod keeps hardware items like spare parts to repair vehicles. He is generating a good amount of revenue from his shop.

To further expand his shop and add on more stock to his store, Binod is requesting a loan amount of 25,000 INR from Kiva's partner Peoples Forum. He will utilize the loan amount to add more spare parts to his store and remodel his store so that he will be able to cater to a larger customer base, and thus, increase the return on investment, which will ultimately result in a higher standard of living for him.

Binod is eagerly awaiting your kind help.

loans.use: to add on more spare parts to his store and remodel his store

loans.name: Akossiwa Philomaine

texts.fr: Mariée et âgée de 40 ans, Akossiwa est une femme qui vit à Adidogomé. Avec quatre enfants à sa charge, Akossiwa est une revendeuse des objets en plastique. Akossiwa s’approvisionne deux fois par mois au marché et le revend en parcourant les quartiers environnant. Akossiwa sollicite ce prêt pour commander des unités de sceaux et de bassines en plastiques afin de satisfaire parfaitement les attentes de ses clients et réaliser une bonne marge bénéficiaire pour subvenir aux charges et besoins quotidiens de sa famille.
texts.en:
Akossiwa is forty years old, married and has four children in her care. She lives in Adidogomé and earns a living selling plastic objects. She buys new stock twice a month from the market and sells it on foot in her local area.

Akossiwa is requesting this loan to buy more plastic bowls and buckets. This will satisfy her customers and earn her a good profit which will pay for the day-to-day expenses of her family.

loans.use: to buy 10 units of plastic bowls and 4 units of plastic buckets.

loans.name: Huda

texts.en:
Huda is a 38-year-old married woman who opened, almost a year ago, a grocery shop to help her husband in covering their needs and expenses. She is a hard worker and a woman who is prepared to accept sacrifices. She is trying hard to develop her business, and is succeeding.

Today, she is acquiring a loan from Kiva's field partner, Al Majmoua, to increase her merchandise with new items and offers for the upcoming Christmas season in order to better serve her customers.

She hopes to keep on expanding her business in the future in order to increase her income and provide her family with decent living conditions.

loans.use: to increase her merchandise with new items and offers for the upcoming Christmas season

loans.name: Ablewa

texts.fr: Mère  de deux enfants, Ablewa est une femme mariée résidant à Adidogomè. Agée de 39 ans, Ablewa produit des gâteaux faite à base de la farine de blé généralement appelé « Africa Tenis » et autres.  Ablewa s’approvisionne deux fois par mois au marché et le revend à la devanture de son domicile et en parcourant les quartiers environnant. Ablewa sollicite ce crédit pour commander des sacs de farine de blé en vue de bien revendre puis gagner des bénéfices afin de satisfaire les attentes des clients puis soutenir son mari à bien prendre en charge les besoins de la famille.
texts.en:
Ablewa is thirty-nine years old, married and mother to two children. She lives in Adidogomé and earns a living making and selling food products. She makes wheatflour cakes known as 'Africa Tenis' and other dishes. She buys her supplies twice a month from the market and sells her food from in front of her home and on foot in her local area.

Ablewa is requesting this loan to buy more sacks of wheatflour. This will enable her to satisfy her customers and help her husband provide for the day-to-day expenses of her family.

loans.use: to buy 2 sacks of wheatflour.

loans.name: Nehmat

texts.en:
Nehmat is a 21-year-old married mother of two and a Palestinian refugee.

Due to the low financial situations of Palestinians in Lebanon, three years ago she started selling mobile phone prepaid cards to help her husband in covering the needs and expenses of their children.

Today Nehmat is acquiring a Youth loan from Kiva's field partner, Al Majmoua, to increase her merchandise with more mobile prepaid cards in order to serve more customers.

She is a very ambitious and hardworking woman who is managing her business well and is becoming well-known in her region. She hopes to expand her business more in the future in order to increase her income and provide her family with decent living conditions.

loans.use: to increase her merchandise with more mobile prepaid cards in order to serve more customers.

loans.name: Afi

texts.fr: Veuve et mère de trois enfants, Afi est une femme âgée de 39 ans qui vit à Adidogomé. Afi est une revendeuse de pagnes qui s’approvisionne deux fois par mois au marché et le revend dans sa boutique à domicile. Afi demande ce prêt pour commander des pièces de pagnes en vue de bien revendre puis de gagner des bénéfices et pouvoir aider ses enfants dans leur éducation scolaire.
texts.en:
Afi is thirty-nine years old, widowed and mother to three children. She lives in Adidogomé and earns a living selling pagnes (traditional, wrap-around clothing). She buys new stock twice a month from the market and sells it from the shop in her home.

Afi is requesting this loan to buy more pagnes. This will earn her a good profit which will pay for the education of her children.

loans.use: to buy 13 pagnes (traditional, wrap-around clothing).

loans.name: Akofa

texts.fr: Mariée et mère de deux enfants, Akofa est une femme âgée de 40 ans habitant à Adidogomè. Akofa est une revendeuse des pagnes qui s’approvisionne deux fois par mois  au marché et le revend en parcourant les quartiers environnant. Pour ce fait, Akofa sollicite ce prêt pour commander des pièces de pagne en vue de bien revendre et de gagner une marge bénéficiaire qui servira à venir en aide à son mari pour soutenir les charges quotidiennes de la famille.
texts.en:
Akofa is forty years old, married and mother to two children. She lives in Adidogomé and earns a living selling pagnes (traditional, wrap-around clothing). She buys new stock twice a month from the market and sells it on foot in her local area.

Akofa is requesting this loan to buy more pagnes. This will satisfy her customers and earn her a good profit which will help her husband provide for the day-to-day expenses of their family.

loans.use: to buy 7 pagnes (traditional, wrap-around clothing).

loans.name: Hanan

texts.en:
Hanan is a 50-year-old married mother of six children. She is a Palestinian refugee who lives in a Palestinian refugee camp.

Due to the low financial and social situations of Palestinians in Lebanon, especially those who live in camps, she started working as a tailor thirty years ago in order to help her husband in covering the increasing needs and expenses of their children. She has a lot of experience in this domain and she is well-known in her region for her professional skills.

Hanan is acquiring a loan from Kiva's field partner, Al Majmoua, to develop her business by buying up-to-date tools and raw materials in order to increase her production and provide her customers with a better and faster service.

She hopes to expand her business more in the future in order to increase her income and improve her family's living conditions inside the camp.

loans.use: to develop her business by buying up-to-date tools and raw materials to increase her production.

loans.name: Veronica De Jesus

texts.es:
Verónica, de 56 años de edad, no tuvo la oportunidad de estudiar, debido a la situación económica de sus padres; es madre soltera, tiene 3 hijos que viven con ella, los demás ya están acompañados.

Verónica, trabaja como empleada doméstica desde hace 5 años, la situación económica la obligo a trabaja en este oficio, su lugar de trabajo está a una distancia de 10 minutos y su horario de trabajo es desde las 8:00 a.m. hasta a las 4:00 p.m. 

Verónica, necesita el préstamo para comprar dos vacas, para aprovechar la leche.

Verónica, sueña con poder iniciar a vender leche, para poder tener una mejor situación económica.
texts.en:
Verónica, 56 years old, did not have the opportunity to study due to her parent's economic situation. She is a single mother. She has three children who live with her, the others are already accompanied.

Verónica makes a living as domestic worker for 5 years. The economic situation forced her to work in this area. Her working place is 10 minutes away and her working schedule is from 8:00 a.m. to 4:00 p.m.

Verónica needs the loan to buy two cows to use the milk.

Verónica dreams to start selling milk to be able to have a better economic situation.

loans.use: to buy two cows to use the milk.

loans.name: Maricor

texts.en:
Maricor is 48 years old and married with six children, one of whom is in school.

Maricor is in the agricultural business, raising pigs in the Philippines. She has requested a PHP 20,000 loan through NWTF in order to buy feeds and vitamins for her pigs, and to repair her pig-pens.

She has been raising pigs for six years now, and has borrowed 15 times in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

In the future, Maricor would like to save enough money to expand her business and to repair her family's home.

loans.use: to buy feeds and vitamins for her pigs, and to repair her pig-pens.

loans.name: Adèle Gisèle

texts.fr: Adèle est une femme mariée dynamique qui vit à Adidogomé avec ses deux enfants et son mari. Adèle est âgée de 43 ans et  s’active énormément pour avoir une bonne situation financière. Adèle est une marchande des basins qui s’approvisionne deux fois par mois au marché et le revend à domicile puis dans les quartiers environnant. Pour atteindre ses objectifs, Adèle sollicite ce prêt pour commander des pièces de basins afin de répondre favorablement aux besoins de ses clients et avoir une autonomie financière remarquable  pour aider ses enfants dans leur éducation scolaire.
texts.en:
Adèle is forty-three years old, married and has two children. She lives in Adidogomé with her family and works hard to earn a good living. She sells 'basins' (pieces of damask fabric). She buys new stock twice a month from the market and sells it from her home and in her local area.

Adèle is requesting this loan to buy more damask fabric. This will satisfy her customers and earn her a very good profit which will pay for the education of her children.

loans.use: to buy 6 pagnes (traditional, wrap-around clothing).

loans.name: Gedeon Manuel

texts.en:
Manuel is 69 years old and he lives in the municipality of Montería in the north of Colombia. He is a hard worker who has always fought to succeed in life, and proof of this is that in 1985 he started his own business. He has a farm where he grows different kinds of products, which is something he learnt to do by himself and is a job he loves doing.

He works 7 days of the week for around 8 hours each day, all because he wants to grow high quality products that can stand out, because he’s aware that his business has a lot of competition in the market. He wants to increase his sales, and this is why he’s asking for a loan that will allow him to buy some agricultural inputs to make his produce grow bigger and better.

Manuel knows he has a lot of life in front of him, and therefore he wants to assure both his and his family's future. He would like to be able to improve the conditions of his house to make it a better home.

Please help Manuel to accomplish all his goals with just a loan.

loans.use: to buy some agricultural inputs to make his produce grow bigger and better.

loans.name: Kere Zoegnande Group

texts.fr: Zoégnandé est la responsable du groupe elle est mariée et mère de 3 enfants dont tous scolarisés. Le groupe de Zoégnandé est son 8 ème contrat de prêt avec ACFIME et les remboursements se font à bonne date. cette brave dame vend des céréales et cela fait 20 ans qu'elle fait ce commerce. Elle a besoin du crédit pour acheter des arachides à 120 000 francs et du Maïs à 80 000 francs. pour faire avancé son activité elle est très accueillante respecte ses client et propose à tout moment la bonne qualité du céréales à ses clients. Après ses ventes, les bénéfices de Zoégnandé lui permettra d'épargne et aussi continuer son activité enfin faire les dépenses de sa famille.
texts.en:
Zoégnandé is the group representative. She is married and has three children who all attend school. This will be the eighth loan for the group with the field partner, ACFIME. All their previous loans have been fully and correctly repaid.

This woman has been selling cereals for twenty years. She will use her loan to buy peanuts for 120,000 francs CFA and maize for 80,000 francs CFA. To ensure that her business has a good reputation she is very welcoming and respectful to her customers, and always offers good quality cereals.

Zoégnandé will save some of her profits and use the rest to improve her business and continue to provide for the expenses of her family.

loans.use: to buy peanuts and maize.

loans.name: Sariphan

texts.en:
Sariphan is a 45-year-old married, differently abled lady from a village in Kandhamal district, Odisha, India. Sariphan has a family of four and one of her sons earns his living by running an auto rickshaw.

She has owned a garment shop for the last five years. She is quite happy to see her business flourish within these five years with an increase in her number of clients. She understands that most women nowadays do not have the time or patience anymore to have customised, fitted garments stitched. Having well-fitting, ready-made garments is the answer. And that is exactly what Sariphan has been doing for the past five years. She has the savvy, the acumen and the understanding - all she needs is a little help with her finances to expand her business.

Therefore, she is requesting a loan amount of 35,000 INR from Kiva's partner Peoples Forum. She will use the loan amount to remodel her shop by adding more wardrobes and cupboards so that she can stock a larger volume of garments and meet the rising customer demands with her supply.

loans.use: to remodel her shop by adding more wardrobes and cupboards so that she can stock a larger volumes of garments.

loans.name: Radhamani

texts.en:
Radhamani is a 24-year-old, unmarried, differently abled lady from a small village in Mayurbhanj district, Odisha, India. She has been running a grocery shop adjacent to her house for the last three years. She has a family of five. Her father helps her in the grocery store to serve her customers better. Her mother is a homemaker and her two sisters are continuing their studies. She has a good number of customers. Although there is huge competition in this business, people in her locality prefer her shop for her quality grocery items and her friendly nature.

She is requesting a loan amount of 15,000 INR from Kiva's partner Peoples Forum. She will use the entire loan amount to expand her grocery store by stocking more inventories, to meet the demands of the people and to earn an extra income so that in the near future, she will be able to build a big shop to stock up her grocery item and provide a pleasant shopping experience to her customers.

Radhamani is eagerly awaiting your generous support and help. She is confident that she will be able to repay the loan within the stipulated period of time.

loans.use: to expand her grocery store by stocking more inventories to meet the demands of the people.

loans.name: Lakshmi

texts.en:
Lakshmi is a humble resident of an interior village in Kandhamal district, Odisha, India. A blessed mother of two sons, Lakshmi is engaged in a food stall business. She works hard to earn a living for her family in the cold nights and sunny morning. Her husband is a rickshaw driver and their household income is just enough to meet the basic needs of the family. She does not have access to a toilet at her home for which she faces numerous difficulties like walking long distances in odd hours to relieve herself and she feels the danger of getting attacked by animals.

Therefore, she is requesting a loan amount of 15,000 INR from Kiva's partner Peoples Forum to build a toilet in her house. Access to a toilet will increase her privacy, safety and hygiene. She is eagerly awaiting your kind help so she can enjoy good health.

loans.use: to build a toilet in her house

loans.name: Luis Amador

texts.es:
Luis es un campesino de 41 años de edad, que durante toda su vida se ha dedicado a realizar las tareas del campo, aprendidas desde que era un niño, cuando sus padres le enseñaban todo lo referente a la agricultura. 

Hoy en día, posee cultivos de frijol cuya cosecha recolecta y vende en la plaza de mercado de la región, adicionalmente, alterna el cuidado de sus cultivos, realizando labores como jornalero en diferentes fincas de la zona, lo que le permite complementar los ingresos que recibe para solventar las necesidades básicas de su familia. 

El cliente tiene el empuje y la tenacidad que caracterizan los campesinos, cualidades que le han permitido salir adelante. Actualmente solicita el apoyo del crédito con el que desea comprar insumos agrícolas al por mayor (pesticidas, fungicidas, abonos, fertilizantes, entre otros), con los cuales podrá continuar cuidando sus cultivos y preparar la tierra para la cosecha, logrando así tener una producción mucho más sana que sirva como valor agregado para facilitar la venta del producto en el mercado. 

Luis manifiesta que su avanzada edad no le impide seguir trabajando en las labores que le apasionan, pues hacen parte de sus raíces y se ha convertido en su fuente de ingresos económicos, con los que podrá seguir sustentando las necesidades familiares y en un futuro podrá disfrutar de una mejor calidad de vida al lado de su esposa.
texts.en:
Luis, 41, is a farmer who has worked in the fields all his life. When he was a child his parents taught him everything related to agriculture.

Nowadays he grows a bean crop which he harvests and sells at the market in the area. He also works as a day laborer on different neighboring farms which allows him to earn extra income to cover basic family needs.

This customer has the drive and tenacity that farmers are known for; they are qualities that have allowed him to get ahead. He currently is requesting a loan to buy farm supplies wholesale (pesticides, fungicides, manures, fertilizers, etc.) which he will use to continue caring for his crops and preparing the land for harvest time. This will give him a much healthier value added produce which will facilitate sale at market.

Luis says the fact that he is middle aged does not stand in the way of his ability to continue working in the job he loves since it is part of his roots and has become his source of income. This is so he can continue to support his family and in the future enjoy a better quality of life with his wife.

loans.use: to buy farm supplies wholesale (pesticides, fungicides, manures, fertilizers, etc.)

loans.name: Dzhumagul

texts.ru: Джумагул, 51 год, замужем, мать 3 детей. В качестве основного источника дохода для семьи, более 20 лет назад начала заниматься разведением скота и полеводством. Благодаря упорному труду на сегодняшний день Джумагул имеет в хозяйстве 2 коровы. На 2,09 Га арендованной и 1,0 Га собственной земли выращивает лук и табак.  Вся деятельность приносит ежемесячную прибыль в сумме около 44,000 сом (KGS). Сделав вывод, что данный бизнес рентабелен, Джумагул обратилась в Банк «Бай –Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 80,000 сом (KGS) на покупку скота для увеличения поголовья. Доходы от кредита Джумагул планирует вложить в дальнейшее развитие хозяйства и хочет накопить на улучшение жилищных условий.
texts.en:
Dzhumagul is 51, married, and the mother of three children.  As a way to provide a main source of income for her family, she became involved in agriculture and animal husbandry more than 20 years ago.  Thanks to her very hard work, she currently has two cows on her farm.  She also grows onions and tobacco on 2.09 hectares of leased land and one hectare of her own land.  Her combined activities bring her a monthly income of about 44,000 som (KGS).  

Having realized how profitable her business could be, Dzhmagul has turned to Kiva's partner, Bai Tushum Bank, and requested a loan of of 80,000 som (KGS) to buy livestock and increase the size of her herd.  She is planning to use the earnings from her loan to further grow her farming business and to save enough money to improve her living conditions.

loans.use: to purchase additional livestock in order to increase the size of her herd.

loans.name: Aida

texts.ru: Аида, 34 года, замужем, мать 3 детей. У нее среднее образование, в качестве основного дохода для своей семьи занимается животноводством и полеводством, стартовав 10 лет назад, с покупки скота на 5,000 сом (KGS). Благодаря упорному труду Аиды, в ее хозяйстве на сегодняшний день имеется: 3 коровы, 20 овец, а также земельный надел размером 1,72 ГА, на котором выращивает перец и клевер. Ежемесячный доход составляет около 7,000 сом (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, Аида обратилась в Банк «Бай –Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 60,000 сом (KGS) на покупку 5 овец и теленка. Доходы от кредита Аида планирует вложить в дальнейшее приумножение количества домашней скотины.
texts.en:
Aida is 34, married, and the mother of three children.  She has a secondary education and is involved in animal husbandry and agriculture, two activities which constitute her family's main source of income.  She started her business 10 years ago when she bought cattle for 5,000 som (KGS).  Thanks to her very hard work, she currently has three cows and 20 sheep on her farm.  She also grows pepper and clover on a 1.72 hectare plot of land.  She makes a monthly income of about 7,000 som (KGS).

In order to further grow her farming business, Aida has turned to Kiva's partner, Bai Tushum Bank, and requested a loan of 60,000 som (KGS) to buy five sheep and one calf.  She is planning to use the earnings from her loan to further increase her number of farm animals.

loans.use: to purchase five sheep and one calf in order to increase her livestock headcount.

loans.name: Justine

texts.fr: Justine est une femme mariée avec trois enfants à charge qui vit à Adidogomé. Justine est une revendeuse de prêt à porter de friperies qui s’approvisionne une fois par mois au marché et le revend sous un hangar au bord de la route. Pour avoir un stock important et maximiser son profit, Justine sollicite ce prêt pour commander des balles de friperies d’habits pour enfants et pour adultes en vue de bien revendre puis de répondre à nombreuse attentes de ses clients afin de gagner des bénéfices et aider ses enfants dans leur éducation scolaire.
texts.en: Justine is a married woman with three dependent children.  She lives in Adidogomé and resells used clothes.  She stocks up once a month at the market and resells in a warehouse located on the side of the road.  Justine is taking this loan in order to have a large stock of merchandise and to maximize her profits.  She will buy children's and adults' used clothes and she hopes to increase her sales and to meet her customers' many needs.  Thanks to this loan, she will be able to make some profits and to take care of her children's education.

loans.use: to buy five bales of children's used clothes and three bales of adults' used clothes.

loans.name: Donaldo Antonio

texts.en:
Antonio is 63 years old and lives in the municipality of Montería. He has been working all his life because he is aware that that is the best way to succeed in life, and he always wants to go further. He has a farm where he grows different kinds of products. This is something that he has been doing for around 20 years. 

Running this kind of job can present some difficulties: for him it is the dry weather which doesn’t let his growth progress. He also does not have the capital to invest in his business like he would like to, and this is the reason why he is asking for a loan that will allow him to buy some agricultural inputs to improve his growth and production. 

Antonio expects that with this his sales can increase giving him better results and a better quality of life. He dreams of improving the conditions of his house, and you can help him accomplish that and more with the loan he needs.

loans.use: to buy some agricultural input to improve his growth and production.

loans.name: Judith

texts.en:
Judith is a hardworking woman entrepreneur with five children.

She has a general store in the Philippines and requested a loan of 28,000 PHP through NWTF in order to buy more groceries such as canned goods, spices and noodles.

She industriously earns additional income through other business ventures like fattening pigs.

Judith dreams that one day she will be able to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy more groceries such as canned goods, spices and noodles.

loans.name: Glesi Del Carmen

texts.en:
Glesi is 37 years old and lives in the municipality of Puerto Escondido. Since she was a little girl she always dreamt of having her own business so that she could provide better for her family and return them everything that they had given her. 6 years ago she started her own business: she has a farm where she grows different kinds of products. 

She s now thinking of taking her business forward in order to increase her sales. Unfortunately it is hard for her to invest in her business because the inputs are really expensive. That is the reason why she has decided to ask for a loan so that she can buy agricultural inputs that allow her to improve production. 

Glesi is a dreamer; she wants to improve the quality of life of her family by improving the house where they all live. Help her accomplish this and more with a loan.

loans.use: buy agricultural input that will allow her to improve production.

loans.name: Evis Rosa

texts.en:
Rosa is 35 years old and lives in the municipality of San Pelayo. She is a woman who has not had an easy life, but who always finds her way to make it all better. She is determined to succeed in life, and this is the reason why she wants to start her own business: so she can do better and help her family.

She wants to start her own restaurant because she has a really good talent: she is an excellent cook. She believes this talent will help her to create a great business that will bring her many good things. She is asking for a loan that will enable her to start her restaurant and buy a stove, cookware, cooking pots and food inputs. 

Rosa is very excited to start her new business. She expects it will let her fix some damages that her house has. She needs your help. Believe in her dream and help her with the loan she needs.

loans.use: let start her restaurant and buy a stove, cookware, cooking pots and food inputs.

loans.name: Ana Judith

texts.en:
Ana is 52 years old and lives in the municipality of Tierralta. She has been working all her life because she wants to give to her family a good quality of life. 3 years ago she took the decision to start her own business, and she now raises chickens.

The business is doing well but is still really small. She wants to make it bigger to increase her profits and make it sustainable, but she doesn’t have the capital to do so. This is the reason why she is asking for a loan that will enable her to make her barn bigger and to buy more chickens and food for them. 

Ana is working really hard to make her business sustainable. She expects that through her business she can make her dreams come true, like fixing some damages that her house has. You can be part of Ana’s story: a loan will make a great difference in her life.

loans.use: make her barn bigger and to buy more chickens and food for them.

loans.name: Rosa

texts.en:
As a widowed mother of four children, Rosa works hard to support her family. She has a rice retailing business in the Philippines. Rosa is borrowing 18,000 PHP through NWTF in order to buy more stocks of rice to sell to customers.

Rosa has been sustaining her business activities through her past 7 loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy more stocks of rice to sell.

loans.name: Arisel Del Carmen

texts.en:
Arisel is 38 years old and lives in the municipality of San Pelayo. She has a daughter who is 14 years old and who is the love of her life. The reason why this mother wakes up every day, motivated to work hard, is to give her daughter a good life. She wants to start a business so that she can provide better for her family.

She is going to start raising pigs in a pigsty that she has already built near her house. She expects that with her business she can have good profits, but the most important thing for her is to sustain it so that it keeps giving her money to live well. She asked for a loan to buy pigs to raise and food to fatten them up. 

Arisel dreams of making some modifications to her house so that it can be more comfortable; and safer. Help Arisel to start off on the right foot in her business and let her improve her life. A loan will do a lot for her.

loans.use: to buy pigs to raise and food to fatten them up.

loans.name: Juan Carlos

texts.en:
Juan is 38 years old and lives in the municipality of Momil. His family has been living in the countryside for many generations, and they have all been farmers. He has now inherited the family business and he is in charge of raising the pigs that are in the farm. This is something his father taught him to do.

The most important thing for this man is to make the business sustainable like it has been for many years and with this keep the family tradition which has helped to provide for all the members of his beautiful family. He is asking for a loan so he can buy more pigs; and some vitamins and food for them.

One of Juan’s biggest dreams is to repair the farm where he and his family lives, so that they can live more comfortably and safer. He just needs people to believe in his dreams and help him accomplish all his goals, and this loan will get him so much closer to that.

loans.use: buy more pigs; and some vitamins and food for them.

loans.name: Luis

texts.es:
Luis viene de una familia de comerciantes, quienes siempre le han apoyado en todo lo referente a sus estudios, es una persona muy sacrificada que con esfuerzo está saliendo adelante.
Está estudiando la carrera de ingeniería industrial y por medio de sus estudios quiere poder abrirse camino en el mundo laboral y ser útil de esa manera a sus seres queridos.
Pide este préstamo para poder pagar las cuotas de su carrera y de esa forma poder seguir con sus estudios. Agradece por la oportunidad que recibe de poder seguir con sus estudios como lo viene haciendo.
texts.en:
Luis comes from a family of merchants who have always supported him in everything related to his education. He is a very hardworking person who with effort is getting ahead.

He is studying industrial engineering and through his education he wants to make his way in the work world and be useful in that way to his loved ones.

He is asking for this loan to pay for college tuition so that he can continue with his education. He is grateful for this opportunity he is receiving to be able to continue his education as he has been doing.

loans.use: to pay college tuition.

loans.name: Cristian Patricio

texts.es: Cristian tiene 24 años de edad, es de estado civil soltero, el es una persona muy responsable y  constante con su trabajo, pues trabaja muy duro para ayudarle con lo necesario a su madre. El se dedica a la crianza y comercio de cuyes, Cristian solicita el crédito para la compra de mas crías y así obtener ganancias para seguir cumpliendo con las necesidades de él y de su pequeño hogar.
texts.en: Cristian is 24 years old. He is single and is a very responsible and stable person in his work. He works very hard to help his mother with the necessities. He raises and sells guinea pigs. Cristian is asking for the loan to buy more young guinea pigs so that he can earn more profit to continue covering his and his small household's needs.

loans.use: to buy and sell guinea pigs.

loans.name: Leidy Yohana

texts.es:
Leidy es una mujer de 24 años de edad, la cual se encuentra solicitando un préstamo para comprar un surtido variado de ropa para hombre y dama, puesto que quiere aprovechar la temporada de fin de año que se avecina.
Ella es una joven independiente la cual decidió generarse sus propias oportunidades laborales montando su negocio, ahora espera tener éxito.
Con su negocio de proyecta toda su vida, comprar vivienda, vehículo, estudiar, tener una familia. Es por esto que con el crédito para abastecerse de ropa, busca generar mayores ventas para estar solida económicamente y darle rienda suelta a sus sueños
texts.en:
Leidy is a 24 year old woman who is asking for a loan to buy a selection of men's and women's clothing. She wants to take advantage of the end of the year season which is very soon.

She is an independent young woman who decided to generate her own work opportunities by starting a business. Now she hopes to be successful. With her business, her life plan is to buy a house, go to school, and have a family. That is why with the loan for clothing inventory, she is seeking to generate more sales to be financially sound and give her dreams free rein.

loans.use: to get clothes inventory for the end of the year season.

loans.name: Jaime Jesus

texts.en:
Jaime is 40 years old and lives in the municipality of Tierralta. He has four children, three daughters who are 1, 9 and 13 years old, and a son who is 7 years old. They are the reason for Jaime’s life, and why he wakes every day to work hard in his business, a farm that he owns where he grows different kind of products.

He’s an entrepreneur who dreams of having a big and successful business, and he’s aware that to accomplish that he not only has to work hard but he has to invest in the business. Right now he lacks the capital to do it, and that’s why he’s asking for a loan so he can buy some agricultural inputs and to pay for some technical assistance.

Jaime wants to see his children grow up to become excellent and professional people, and he knows that the best way to accomplish that is by investing in their education. That is his biggest dream. You can be part of Jaime’s success story; a loan will help him a lot.

loans.use: buy some agricultural inputs and to pay for some technical assistance.

loans.name: Luzviminda

texts.en:
As a widowed mother of three children, Luzviminda works hard to support her family.

She has a vegetable vending business in the Philippines. Luzviminda is borrowing PHP 11,000 through NWTF in order to buy more vegetables to sell for her vegetable vending business.

Luzviminda has been sustaining her business activities through her past 10 loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream: to save enough money to expand her business and repair her family's home.

loans.use: to buy more vegetables to sell.

loans.name: Lina Marcela

texts.en:
Lina is just 19 years old and lives in the municipality of Taraza. Her family is the most important thing for her. Unfortunately, they have had some economic issues throughout their lives. This is the reason why Lina has been working hard to provide a better life for them.

Five years ago she started to sell clothes. To keep providing for her family, she wants to take her business to another level; she wants to improve her sales and make the business sustainable. She hopes one day she can offer jobs to more people. She’s asking for a loan so she can buy men's and women's clothing to stock up and have more to sell.

Lina dreams of having a successful business that will let her change her and her family’s lives. She also wants to do some improvements to the house where they all live. You can help Lina with a loan and watch her accomplish greats things.

loans.use: to buy men's and women's clothing to stock up and have more to sell.

loans.name: Diana Isabel

texts.en:
Diana is just 19 years old and lives in the municipality of Taraza. She has a beautiful little 3-year-old daughter who is the reason for Diana’s life. She decided when her daughter was born to start her own business, a food place, taking advantage of her talent as a cook.

Having a daughter is not easy, even moreso for a single mother who has to work hard to provide for her. But that’s not an obstacle for her; it is a motivation to succeed. She wants to improve her sales and make the business last over time. That’s why she’s asking for a loan so she can buy inputs for her food business so she can prepare new recipes.

Diana wants to see her daughter grow up to be an excellent person and a strong and intelligent woman. That’s why she dreams of paying for the best education for her. Be part of this beautiful story; loan now and change these women's lives.

loans.use: to buy inputs for her food business so she can prepare new recipes.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: la joven a quien se le ha pixeleado la cara por tener 25 años de edad y vivir en zona de alto riesgo, se dedica a la venta de ropa de segunda mano desde hace 8 años su negocio esta ubicado en su lugar de residencia y tiene muchos clientes, con lo que obtiene de sus ventas logra solventar algunos gastos de su hogar, la joven vive en casa propia con su compeñero de vida y su hijo, ella esta solicitando un credito para la compra de mas ropa por mayor para poder continuar con sus ventas y asi tener mejores ingresos economicos.
texts.en:
The young woman, whose face is blurred for being 25 years old and living in a high-risk area, has been selling secondhand clothing for 8 years. 

Her business is located in her place of residence and she has many clients. With the profits she obtains from her sales she manages to cover some of the household expenses. 

This young woman lives with her life partner and her son. She is requesting a loan in order to buy more wholesale clothing and be able to continue selling, therefore increasing her income.

loans.use: to buy more wholesale clothing

loans.name: Ederlinda

texts.en:
Ederlinda is 61 years old and married with two children.

Ederlinda works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 20,000 loan through NWTF to purchase additional groceries to sell like canned goods, noodles, spices, milk, coffee, drinks, shampoo, bread, and other personal care products.

She successfully repaid her previous loan and now she has requested another loan to further build her businesses. Ederlinda has borrowed and repaid 14 loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for five years and also earns an income from fishing. Ederlinda aspires to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase additional groceries to sell like canned goods, noodles, spices, milk, coffee, drinks, shampoo, bread, and other personal care products.

loans.name: Renuka

texts.en:
Renuka is a humble resident of an interior village in Kandhamal district, Odisha, India. A blessed mother of two beautiful daughters and wife of a daily wage labourer, Renuka is engaged in a vegetable farming business. Their household income is just enough to meet the basic needs of the family and they have access to very limited resources.

Renuka does not have access to a toilet at her home for which reason she faces numerous difficulties like walking long distances at odd hours to relieve herself, and she feels the danger of being attacked by animals.

Therefore, she is requesting a loan in the amount of 15,000 INR from Kiva's partner People's Forum to build a hygienic toilet in her house. Access to a toilet will increase her privacy, safety, and hygiene.

She is eagerly awaiting your kind help and hoping to enjoy good health.

loans.use: to build a hygienic toilet in her house

loans.name: Namita

texts.en:
Namita is a rural woman from a small village in Kandhamal district, Odisha, India. She lives there with her husband and their only son. Her son is a student of class 9. Namita’s husband is engaged in a fish vending business, and Namita sells vegetables in the local market to help earn their livelihood.

Their monthly income is barely enough to meet all the household needs along with education expenses of their only son. As a result, over the years, they have been using a common toilet which is very unhygienic and also far from their home. So they have been facing lot of discomfort. Walking to deserted areas to relive themselves at odd hours of the day makes Namita feel unsafe, and she can sense the risk of crimes and molestation.

Due to lack of capital, Namita is unable to build a toilet of her own. Therefore, she is requesting a loan in the amount of 15,000 INR from Kiva's partner People's Forum to build a clean and hygienic toilet at her home and enjoy a healthy and disease-free life.

loans.use: to build a clean and hygienic toilet at her home

loans.name: Malati

texts.en:
Malati is an industrious lady from a small village of Kandhamal district, Odisha, India. Malati's husband is a farmer by trade. The income of her husband is used to meet the daily household expenses. They have hardly any savings. Therefore, Malati was never able to build a toilet in her house, for which reason she is suffering a lot. She has to go long distances and to isolated places in order to relieve herself. She does not find this practice to be safe as she understands the importance of having a toilet at home.

Therefore, she is requesting a loan in the amount of 15,000 INR to build a toilet and incorporate water pipes to it. The loan will result in enhancing her cleanliness, health, and hygiene.

Malati is in dire need of your kind help.

loans.use: to build a toilet and incorporate water pipes to it.

loans.name: Claudia Cristina

texts.en:
Originally from Puebla, Mexico, Claudia owned and managed a retail business with her ex-husband for many years. The business eventually closed when Claudia and her husband divorced, but Claudia always had a passion for being self-employed and owning her own business.

Before moving to the United States, Claudia lived in Spain with her boyfriend and stayed there for a few months. This is where her passion for dancing began.

It was then that Claudia decided to move to San Ysidro, California, and open the first dance school in the area with a friend. Claudia secured the lease and purchased the equipment; however, the partnership was dissolved and Claudia decided to continue with the dance school on her own.

Claudia wants to make sure that all children have the same opportunities, so she keeps her prices very accessible for everyone, especially the children in the low-to-moderate income communities.

Most of the equipment and other business assets were taken by her original partner and left Claudia with nothing. Claudia will use her Kiva loan to purchase some sound equipment, make tenant improvements, purchase uniforms to sell and for marketing.

loans.use: to purchase some sound equipment, make tenant improvements, purchase uniforms to sell and for marketing.

loans.name: Ofelia

texts.en:
Ofelia is 65 years old and a widow with four children. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur.

Ofelia has a rice retailing business in the Philippines. Ofelia has been in this business for five years.

Ofelia requested a PHP 21,000 loan amount through NWTF in order to buy more stocks of rice to sell.

In the future, Ofelia would like to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy more stocks of rice to sell.

loans.name: Devis Maria

texts.es:
Devis es un hombre soltero el cual se vale de su talento en la marquetería par a generar los ingresos con los que compra el alimento y paga las respectivas cuentas que se presentan en un hogar, aprendió de la profesión trabajando en negocios similares, pero la ejerce de manera independiente a principios del presente año.
Devis decidió convertirse en independiente por una razón, busca mejorar sus recursos para comprar una vivienda propia y vivir el resto de su vida tranquilamente.
Solicita un préstamo para mejorar su actividad, el dinero será usado en adecuaciones locativas, principalmente en el techo, quiere reforzarlo para evitar filtros de agua que pudieran dañar su madera, también comprara madera para elaborar los marcos, aerosoles y cristal.
texts.en:
Devis is a single man, he makes use of his talent for marquetry to generate income to pay for food and household bills. He learned the trade from working in similar businesses, but he has been working independently since the beginning of this year.

Devis decided to work on his own for one reason: to increase his earnings in order to buy his own house and live out the rest of his life in peace.

He is soliciting a loan to improve his business. He will use the money to make improvements to his work space, mainly the roof, he wants to reinforce it to avoid leaks that could damage his wood. He will also purchase wood to make the frames, aerosols and glass.

loans.use: to buy wood for making frames, aerosols and glass.

loans.name: Radharani

texts.en:
Radharani is a simple and a humble lady from a village of Kandhamal district of Odisha, India. She has a family of three consisting of herself, her husband, and her daughter. Radharani is a grocer by trade and works very hard in order to sustain her livelihood and fulfill all the basic necessities.

The major problem that concerns her is that she does not have an appropriate toilet in her house and has to depend upon the open field to attend nature's call.This makes her more vulnerable to crime and molestation. She is a very concerned lady and does not find it safe to walk long distances and depend upon isolated places for defecation.

So in order to restore her privacy and increase her safety and hygiene, she is requesting for a loan in the amount of 15,000 INR from Kiva's partner People's Forum to build a safe, clean and hygienic toilet at her home.The loan amount will ultimately result in her safeguarding her family's health so as to reduce their medical expenses.

loans.use: to build a safe, clean and hygienic toilet at her home.

loans.name: Diego Fernando

texts.en:
Diego is 23 years old and lives in the municipality of Montería. He’s a young man with many dreams; one of them is to give to his family a good quality of life. He has two sons; one is 2 years old and the other one is a baby boy with just 2 months of age. They are everything for him and the reason why he works hard.

He has his own business: a wood recycling car that he drives around his city to collect all the recycling. His father taught him to do that job.

Unfortunately, his car broke down so he can’t do his job. He is asking for a loan to fix the wood car to keep his recycling business and improve the profits.

Diego loves his sons more than everything, and he wishes that one day they can get the best education so they grow up as smart men. He hopes his business will let him do that for his children. Help Diego to keep his business and give to his family the best life he can. A loan will do a lot for him.

loans.use: fix the wood car to keep his recycling business going and improve the profits.

loans.name: Nubia Maria

texts.es: Nubia se está preparando para la temporada de diciembre, ella una mujer de 43 años de edad la cual se dedica a vender productos de la canasta familiar se encuentra solicitando tu apoyo para comprar un enfriador, surtido de licores como cerveza, aguardiente y ron y la construcción de una estantería para exhibirlos, un dinero que le serviría para tener nuevos productos a la venta y lo más importante disponer de uno de los productos más vendidos en la temporada de diciembre, el licor.
texts.en:
Nubia is preparing for the December season. She is a 43-year-old woman who sells staple goods and she is requesting your support in order to buy a refrigerator, an assortment of alcoholic beverages (such as beer, brandy and rum) and to build a counter to display them.

The loan would help to supply new products and, more importantly, to stock one of the biggest selling products of December: brandy.

loans.use: to buy a refrigerator, an assortment of alcoholic beverages (such as beer, brandy and rum) and to build a counter to display them.

loans.name: Ceneida De Los Angeles

texts.es:
Ceneida es una microempresaria dedicada y trabajadora, su campo de acción es la confección, prestando el servicio a terceros.
Todo comenzó hace unos meses cuando trabajaba como operaria en un taller de confección; hoy en día, a sus 36 años de edad, ya tiene su propio taller en el que genera 1 empleo directo; trabaja todos los días y su fortaleza es la fabricación de pantalones y camisas de uniformes; de esta forma genera los recursos suficientes para apoyar a su esposo con la carga económica del hogar.

El crédito que solicita será invertido en la compra de insumos para la confección, así podrá cumplir con los requerimientos de sus clientes y entregar los pedidos de manera oportuna, con el fin aumentar la producción y adquirir nuevos contratos, que permitan darle continuidad a su microempresa.

Ceneida sueña con seguir fortaleciendo su taller y tener cada día mayor nivel de producción para generar nuevas oportunidades de empleo y mejorar la calidad de vida tanto de su familia como la de las personas que influyen diariamente en su labor.
texts.en: Ceneida is a dedicated and hard working micro-entrepreneur. Her area of action is tailoring, serving others. Everything started a few month ago when she was working as a seamstress at a sewing shop. Today, at 36 years of age, she has her own sewing shop where she employs one person. She works everyday and her specialty is tailoring pants and making uniform shirts. This way, she generates enough income to support her husband with the household expenses. The loan she is requesting will be invested in buying materials for sewing, thus this will allow her to meet her clients needs and deliver her orders in a timely manner. This will increase production and will attract new contracts which will provide continuity to her business. Ceneida dreams of improving her shop and of increasing the level of production to generate new employment opportunities and improve her family's  and her workers' quality of life.

loans.use: To buy materials for sewing.

loans.name: Purnachandra

texts.en:
Purnachandra is a 25-year-old, differently-able man from a village of Mayurbhanj district, Odisha, India. He is a married man and has five family members. For the last four years he has been running a grocery store. He is a man with high ambition and self respect. He has never let himself become a burden on his family.

Purnachandra works hard in order to supplement his family's income.Over these four years he has been able to retain a pretty large customer base due to his kind nature and humble behavior.

He is requesting a loan in the amount of 15,000 INR from Kiva's partner People's Forum to add more stocks of grocery items to his store. More than 50 households in the locality depend on his store. He will match the demand of these households with his supply and make them satisfied with his quality products and service.

Purnachandra is eagerly awaiting your kind help and support. He is confident that he will be able to repay the loan amount within the stipulated time period.

loans.use: to add more stocks of grocery items to his store

loans.name: Marie

texts.fr: Marie est une femme divorcée qui vit à Adidogomè avec deux enfants à charge. Marie est âgée de 43 ans et  s’active parfaitement  pour avoir une bonne situation financière. Marie est une revendeuse des pagnes. Marie s’approvisionne deux fois par mois au marché et le revend à domicile et en parcourant les quartiers environnant. Pour atteindre ses objectifs, Marie demande ce prêt pour commander des pièces de pagnes en vue de répondre favorablement aux attentes de ses clients et de bien revendre puis avoir une autonomie financière remarquable  pour aider ses enfants dans leur éducation scolaire.
texts.en:
Marie is a divorced woman who lives in Adidogomè, raising two children. She is 43 and she works hard to have a good financial situation, selling lengths of African print cloth. She stocks up twice a month at the market and sells out of her home and by walking through the neighboring districts.

Wishing to reach her goals, Marie is asking for this loan to order some lengths of African print cloth so as to respond favorably to the expectations of her customers. She wants to make a lot of sales and have considerable financial autonomy to be able to help her children with their education.

loans.use: to buy 24 lengths of African print cloth.

loans.name: Susan

texts.en:
Susan is 37 years old, married and has five children who are presently in school.

Susan is in the agricultural business, pig fattening in the Philippines. Susan requested a PHP 15000 loan through NWTF to buy feed and other supplies to raise her pig.

Susan has been in this business for 3 years, and has borrowed 6 times in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

In the future, Susan would like to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy feed and other supplies to raise her pig.

loans.name: Emily

texts.en:
Emily is a hardworking entrepreneur with nine children.

She earns a living by raising pigs in the Philippines. She is borrowing PHP 13,000 through NWTF in order to buy feed, medicines and vaccines for her pigs.

She successfully paid back her previous loan and is now requesting a new loan to further build her business.

Emily dreams that one day, she will be able to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs.

loans.name: Mildry Luz

texts.es:
Mildry es una mujer de 30 años de edad, la cual se dedica a atender y administrar un negocio de cibercafé, la necesidad de generar recursos, la falta de oportunidades laborales la llevaron a convertirse en independiente, monto el negocio gracias a un préstamo el cual termino de pagar y desde entonces le ha ido bien, dado que las personas de la zona son de bajos recursos y no cuenta con acceso a internet o con algún ordenador en sus casas.
La cliente trabaja para pagar la educación de sus niños, tiene dos uno de 11 y la pequeña de 4, por ellos es que se levanta cada día a dar lo mejor de sí, quiere construirle un futuro, generarles la primera oportunidad de éxito en su vida, el estudio.
Solicita un préstamo para la compra de un computador y realziar adecuaciones al local.
texts.en: Mildry is a 30 year old woman who works managing and working a cybercafe. The need to generate income and the lack of work opportunities led her to become independent. She started the business thanks to a loan which was paid off, and since then it has gone well because the people in the area are low income and don't have access to a computer or internet at home. She works to pay her children's education, ages 11 and 4. It is for them that she wakes up every morning to give them her best, as she wants to build a future and give them the first opportunity for success in their lives, an education. She is asking for a loan to buy a computer and make improvements to her store.

loans.use: To buy a computer and make improvements to her store.

loans.name: Carlos Alberto

texts.en:
Carlos is 35 years old, and lives in the municipality of Medellin. He has 2 children who he loves more than anything, and for whom he works really hard. In order to provide a better living for them, he decided to start his own business. He is going to solve his family's economic problems by raising chicken.

He is asking for a loan, so he can build a chicken coop, buy more chicken and food for them, He hopes that this loan will give him an extra income, so he can support his family with everything that they need. He also wants to improve the conditions of his house so they all can live better.

You can help Carlos with just a loan and change his family’s lives.

loans.use: build a chicken coop, buy more chicken and feed.

loans.name: Xanh

texts.en:
Mrs. Xanh is a hardworking woman, 27 years old. She is married and has two children. Her family’s income is mainly from small business and husbandry.

She would like to take a loan to build a latrine, which can help to improve the health of her family’s member. With support from her husband, she is able to repay the loan monthly.

loans.use: to build the latrine to improve the health of her family.

loans.name: Erika Tatiana

texts.en:
Erika is 22 years old and lives in the municipality of Medellín. She’s a single woman who works hard, so she and her family can have a bright future. 3 years ago, she inherited a business from her family, and she learned to manage, it thanks to her grandmother. She is the owner of a clothes store.

She’s asking for a loan so she can buy more inputs, dresses and clothes so she can have more inventory to offer at her store. She expects that with this investment, her store is going to improve the sales by increasing the clients, and that way, the profits too. She dreams of buying a house where her family can have a comfortable and safe life.

Erika is looking for a little support, and you can help her with the loan she’s asking for.

loans.use: buy more inputs, dresses and clothes for her clothing store.

loans.name: Flor De Maria

texts.es:
Flor, estudio hasta noveno grado, no pudo seguir con sus estudios debido a la situación económica de sus padres, actualmente está acompañada, su pareja trabaja en la agricultura y sus hijos están estudiando.

Flor, tiene una pequeña tienda en su casa, pero también se dedica a la agricultura junto a su esposo, gracias a esa pequeña tienda puede obtener algunos ingresos extras para su hogar, el lugar donde cultiva está a 20 minutos de su casa y sus hijos le ayudan con la tienda.

Flor, necesita el préstamo para comprar granos básicos, para tener más surtida la tienda en la temporada navideña.  


Flor, sueña con mejorar su calidad de vida y ampliar más su casa.
texts.en:
Flor studied until the 9th grade but was unable to continue due to her parents' financial situation. She is currently in a relationship; her partner works in agriculture and her children are in school.

Flor has a small store in her home but she also works in agriculture with her common-law husband. Thanks to that small store she is able to obtain additional income for her household. The area she farms is 20 minutes away from her residence and her children help her with the store.

Flor needs a loan in order to buy staple goods and further supply her store during the holiday season.

She dreams of improving her quality of life and expanding her house.

loans.use: to buy staple goods to further supply her store during the holiday season.

loans.name: Jose Antonio

texts.es: Jose de 52 años de edad vive en casa propia con su grupo familiar, el posee una pequeña tienda ubicada en su lugar de residencia desde hace 2 años, tiene muchos clientes por los buenos precios y la amabilidad que tiene a la hora de vender, el está solicitando un crédito para poder comprar más sopas, huevos, granos básicos, refrescos, golosinas, pan dulce, etc. y así poder tener mejores ingresos para una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Jose is 52 years old and lives in his own house with his family. For the past two years he has had a small store which is located in his house. Thanks to his good prices and pleasant nature he has many customers.

Jose is asking for a loan so he can buy more soups, eggs, basic grains, soft drinks, snacks, sweet bread, etc. which will lead to increased income and a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy more soups, eggs, basic grains, soft drinks, snacks, sweet bread, etc.

loans.name: Elsa Maribel

texts.es: Elsa es una mujer trabajadora que se dedica a la crianza y venta de cerdos, actividad que le ha permitido sacar adelante a su familia desde hace 10 años, por lo que ya cuenta con clientes fijos para sus productos. Ella tiene 34 años de edad y vive con su compañera de vida y su hijo de 5 años de edad, a los que siempre busca la manera de brindar lo mejor, por lo que ha decidido solicitar un crédito a FUSAI para comprar: lámina galvanizada, madera, clavos y alambre para mejorar su vivienda, ya que como se observa en la fotografía está deteriorada.
texts.en:
Elsa is a hard-working woman whose occupation is raising and selling pigs. She has regular customers for her products, and this has allowed her to sustain her family for the past ten years.

She is 34 years old and lives with her life partner and their five-year-old son. Elsa is always looking for ways to provide the best for them, and this is why she is applying to FUSAI for a loan. She will use it to buy galvanized metal, wood, nails and wire to fix up her house which is in poor condition, as can be seen in the photo.

loans.use: to buy galvanized metal, wood, nails, and wire to repair her house, which is in poor condition.

loans.name: Hernando De Jesus

texts.es:
Hernando es un campesino de 51 años de edad. Desde muy joven aprendió de su padre a realizar todas las labores del campo y, gracias a ello, hoy en día posee cultivos de café, cuyas cosechas son recolectadas y vendidas en la plaza de mercado del pueblo donde reside; de esta manera ha generado los recursos económicos suficientes para llevar el alimento y el sustento a su familia.

A pesar de los desafíos que se presentan en el campo agrícola, debido a los altos costos de los insumos y a la inestabilidad de los precios de venta de los productos que han generado crisis en el sector, él ha logrado salir adelante con su perseverancia, empuje y espíritu de superación.

El crédito que solicita es para comprar diversos productos para el cuidado de sus cultivos como abonos, pesticidas, fungicidas, entre otros; así estará en la capacidad de obtener una mejor producción y poder tener un mayor nivel de utilidades a la hora de vender el producto.

Hernando sueña con seguir fortaleciendo su negocio, por lo que requiere seguir luchando para ampliar sus cultivos y tener una mayor producción para garantizar una estabilidad económica.
texts.en:
Hernando, age 51, is a farmer. When he was very young he learned from his father how to do all of the farm work. Thanks to this, he now has coffee crops. His harvests are gathered and sold at the market plaza in the town where he lives. This is they way he has generated enough financial resources to provide his family with food and support.

In spite of the challenges in the agricultural field that are due to the high costs of supplies and the instability of the sales prices of the products, which have caused a crisis in the area, he has managed to get ahead through his perseverance, drive, and determination to succeed.

The loan that he is requesting is to buy diverse products like fertilizers, pesticides, and fungicides, among others, to care for his crops. This way he will have the ability to get a better production, and he will be able to have a greater level of profits when he sells the product.

Hernando dreams of continuing to strengthen his business. In order to continue to do so, he needs to continue struggling to expand his crops and to have a greater production in order to guarantee financial stability.

loans.use: to buy diverse products like fertilizers, pesticides, and fungicides in order to care for his crops.

loans.name: Dani Mauricio

texts.es:
Con su gran manera de trabajar, el amor por su familia, su convicción de salir adelante y la fe que tiene en sus sueños, Dani ha tenido la fortaleza para trabajar en su finca con la cría de cerdos.

Esta es una actividad que le ha dado muchas oportunidades y que le ha permitido darle un sustento digno a su familia.

Hoy en día sus animales necesitan un lugar mejor para albergarlos, es por ello que solicita un préstamo para comprar los materiales necesarios para la construcción de una marranera y comprara una cerda de cría.

Con el apoyo del crédito podrá comprar estos materiales y es por eso que busca ayuda en los prestadores de kiva y en el apoyo de Interactuar.
texts.en:
With his great work ethic, love for his family, conviction to succeed, and the faith that he has in his dreams, Dani has had the strength to work on his farm raising pigs.

This is a job that has given him many opportunities and has allowed him to give his family a decent foundation.

Today, his animals need a better place to be housed. It is for this that he is seeking a loan to buy the materials necessary for the construction of a pig pen and a breeding sow.

With the support of the loan, he will be able to buy these materials, and so he is looking for help from the lenders of Kiva and the support of Interactuar.

loans.use: to buy the materials necessary for the construction of a pig pen and a breeding sow.

loans.name: Erika Johanna

texts.en:
Erika is just 18 years old and lives in the municipality of Sahagun. She’s a young woman that dreams of giving to her family the best life she can. That’s why she decided to start her own business. She is going to raise pigs, something that her boyfriend taught her to do, and that she hopes. will help her provide for her family.

She’s asking for a loan so she can buy pigs and food for them. She trusts that this new business is going to be successful, and will last for many years. She dreams of buying a house where her family can have a great life.

Help Erika to accomplish all her dreams with just a loan.

loans.use: buy pigs and food for them

loans.name: Welma

texts.en:
Welma is married and has one child. She has had a vegetables business for 15 years and works hard to support her family.

Welma requests 10,000 PHP through NWTF to purchase squash, beans, egg plant, and bananas.

She earns additional income from a general store.

In the future, Welma would like to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to purchase squash, beans, eggplant, and bananas.

loans.name: Mèlé

texts.fr: Mèlé est une femme mariée résidant à Adidogomé avec deux enfants à charge. Mèlé est âgée de 47 ans et est une revendeuse de chaussures et de pagnes qui s’approvisionne deux fois par mois au marché et le revend à domicile et dans les quartiers environnant. Pour financer son achat, Mèlé nécessite ce prêt pour commander des sacs des unités de paires de chaussures et des pièces de pagnes en vue de bien revendre et de réaliser plus de bénéfice puis pouvoir aussi relancer son activité afin de soutenir son mari dans les charges de la famille et permettre une bonne éducation scolaire à leurs enfants.
texts.en:
Mèlé is a married woman living in Adidogomé with two children. Mèlé is 47 years old and is a seller of shoes and pagnes. She buys these twice a month in the market, and resells them door-to-door and in the local neighbourhood.
In order to fund her purchase, Mèlé needs this loan to order bags of shoes and pagnes; thus she can have strong sales and earn more profit to relaunch her business. In this way, she can support her husband with the family's expenses and ensure a good education for her children.

loans.use: to buy eight pairs of shoes and eight 'pagne' traditional fabrics.

loans.name: Quyen

texts.en:
Mrs. Quyen is 40 years old, is a hardworking woman. There are four people in her family. The loan can help her to build a sanitary latrine, which can contribute to improve the health for her family as well as environment protection.
Small business is the main income source of her family so she is able to pay the loan monthly .

loans.use: to build the latrine to improve the health of her family

loans.name: Jennifer Carolina

texts.es:
Jenifer, de 31 años de edad, estudio hasta noveno grado, está acompañada, su pareja trabaja como vigilante y junto a él tiene 1 hijo de 5 años de edad que está en kinder.  

Jenifer, vende productos de belleza por catalogo desde hace varios años, este negocio lo conoció a través de unas amigas que le dijeron que era un buen negocio, ella sale a diferentes comunidades a promocionar y vender sus productos . 

Jenifer, necesita el préstamo para comprar lociones, cosméticos y cremas para tener más productos para vender. 

Jenider, sueña con ver a su hijo graduado de una carrera universitaria.
texts.en:
Jenifer, age 31, went to school through the ninth grade. She is in a relationship, and her life partner works as a security guard. She has a five year old son who is in kindergarten.

Jenifer has been selling beauty products by catalog for several years. She became acquainted with this business through some friends who told her that it was a good business. She goes to different communities to promote and sell her products.

Jenifer needs the loan to buy lotions, cosmetics, and creams in order to have more products to sell.

Jenifer dreams of seeing her son graduate with a university degree.

loans.use: to buy lotions, cosmetics, and creams in order to have more products to sell.

loans.name: Luis Simon

texts.en:
Simon is 45 years old and lives in the municipality of Sahagun. Last year a friend of Simon's introduced him to a new business, he taught him everything that he needed to know so he could start on the right foot. He now owns a business to raise pigs, something that let him provide for his family.

He’s asking for a loan to repair the pigsty and to food for the pigs. He´s been working really hard to make his business successful, he hopes it can be more competitive and can last for many years from now. He would like to repair his house.

You can help Simon by loaning now and supporting his dreams.

loans.use: to repair a pigsty and  buy food for the pigs.

loans.name: Gustavo Gil

texts.en:
Gustavo is a 40-year-old man who lives in the municipality of Sahagun. He has 2 children, a son (10) and a daughter (11). They are the love of his life, and he is very proud of them. He decided to start his own business 8 years ago to provide for them; he sells frozen fish.

He’s asking for a loan to buy frozen fish to increase his stock. He hopes his investment will help him be more competitive in the market and will make the business sustainable. He wants to educate his children and improve the conditions of his house.

Help Gustavo with the loan he needs.

loans.use: buy frozen fish.

loans.name: Hassan

texts.en:
Hassan is 25-year-old ambitious single man, seeking to develop his current barber business and living as much as he can.
He left school during his elementary classes, to support his family in making their living. Now he has nine years of experience in this domain and is working hard to keep on developing his skills and basic talents.

His business income is invested in paying for his own and family's living, in addition to some minor business development needs.
Hassan decided to acquire a YOUTH loan from Kiva's field partner Al Majmoua, to open a new barbershop and buy his necessary needs and tools to increase his income and develop his living.
He is very optimistic about this step forward, and will make sure to keep on developing his business.

loans.use: to open a new barbershop and buy the necessary tools to increase his income and develop his living.

loans.name: Hassan

texts.en:
Hassan is 27-year-old man from Jabalia City, married and father to one son. Hassan was living with his family in a small humble house, but during the latest war on Gaza his house destroyed completely, then he had to rent a small apartment in the same area.

Recently Hassan took a USD loan from Palestine for credit and Development (FATEN) in order to rebuild his former house. The loan will allow Hassan to finalize the needed construction in a short time and return his family to their normal life.
Hassan appears in the photo.

loans.use: to rebuild his former house, destroyed by war.

loans.name: Emie

texts.en:
Emie is 39 years old and married with seven children.

Emie is in the agricultural business of raising pigs in the Philippines. Emie requested a PHP 8,000 loan through NWTF in order to buy medicines and vaccines for her pigs.

Emie has been raising pigs for nine years now, and has borrowed 10 times in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

In the future, Emie would like to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy medicines and vaccines for her pigs.

loans.name: Letecia

texts.en:
Letecia is 44 years old and has three children. Letecia is married, and all three children are in school.

Letecia is in the agricultural business of raising pigs in the Philippines. Letecia requested a PHP 11,000 loan through NWTF in order to buy feeds and other supplies to raise her pigs.

Letecia has been raising pigs for two years now, and has borrowed four times in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

In the future, Letecia would like to save enough money so she continue to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy feeds and other supplies to raise her pigs.

loans.name: Gayane

texts.en:
Gayane is a farmer and mother of three sons, living in Vedi town of Ararat region. She lives with her husband, her elderly retired mother-in-law and three children.
