Gayane is a nurse by profession with a bachelor's degree. She currently works in her profession and simultaneously runs the farm with her family. They keep sheep and hens and also have 5 apple trees growing in the orchard.

Sheep breeding is the main source of income for Gayane's family. The requested loan will help her to purchase 15 sheep and forage for feeding the livestock, so her farm will be developed and profitable.

loans.use: to pay for 15 sheep and forage for feeding the livestock

loans.name: Mutumba Business Group

texts.fr:
J. Marie  fait partie du groupe  Mutumba Business et  habite à  Bujumbura. Il a 32 ans et est marié à Aline, une cultivatrice, ensemble ils ont 2 enfants âgés de 1 a  7 ans dont 1 étudie. 

Il a sa sœur a sa charge et elle  étudie.

 Il fait le commerce de  fruits (pomme, raisin,…),  depuis  3 ans. 

Il est à son troisième   crédit  à Turame. Avec le crédit KIVA qu’il obtient, il va  augmenter son capital et acheter  beaucoup de fruits(raisins et pommes)  à revendre pour gagner plus. 

Dans les prochaines  années, il  voudrait pratiquer l’élevage  et  ouvrir une boucherie.
texts.en:
J. Marie is a member of the Mutumba Business group and he lives in Bujumbura.
He is 32 years old and is married to Aline, a market gardener. Together they have two children, aged one and seven years old; one of them is in school.
His sister is a student and is also financially dependent on him.

He has been a fruit seller (apples, grapes, ...) for three years. This is his third loan with Turame. With the Kiva loan he is requesting, he will increase his working capital and buy a large quantity of fruit (grapes and apples) for resale, to increase his income.

In the coming years, he would like to rear livestock and open a butcher's shop.

loans.use: buy a large quantity of grapes and apples for commercial resale.

loans.name: Leidy Yuliana

texts.es:
Leidy es una mujer emprendedora que trabajó durante un tiempo en diferentes empresas, pero hace un tiempo decidió iniciar un pequeño negocio en casa. 
Ella trabaja en la venta de ropa y calzado para dama todos los días desde las 9:00 am hasta las 9:00 pm. 

Leidy utilizará el crédito solicitado a la Corporación Interactuar para comprar al por mayor surtido de ropa para dama, calzado, accesorios, entre otros.

Ella sueña con acreditar el negocio y con poder incrementar sus ingresos, que le permitan tener un mejor nivel de vida.
texts.en:
Leidy is an enterprising woman who has worked for some time at different companies. However, some time ago she decided to start a small business at her house. She works selling women's clothes and shoes every day from 9:00 a.m. until 9:00 p.m.

Leidy will use the loan she requested from the Interactuar corporation to buy stock of women's clothes, shoes, and accessories, among other items, wholesale.

She dreams of positioning the business in the area and of being able to increase her earnings. This will allow her to have a better standard of living.

loans.use: to buy a stock of women's clothes, shoes, and accessories, among other items, wholesale.

loans.name: Ranulfo

texts.en:
Ranulfo is very hardworking man. He raises and sells hogs to the locals in his place. He is 39 years old and single. He resides in the town of Sagbayan.

He would like to raise quality hogs to gain more income. Ranulfo has requested a loan from CEVI to invest in piglets and feed. In that way, his income will slowly improve. He could also set aside some of the profit for future use. He could also invest in other business opportunities to have other sources of income.

He dreams of having a family, and he is doing his best to improve his way of living to become sustainable.

loans.use: to invest in piglets and feed

loans.name: Lyn Marie

texts.en:
Lyn Marie is a hardworking woman entrepreneur with four children.

She has a fishing business in the Philippines and requested a PHP 12,000 loan through NWTF in order to buy a new engine for her fishing boat.

She successfully paid back her previous loan and is now requesting a new loan to further build her business.

Lyn Marie dreams that one day, she will be able to save money to expand her business and continue to send her children to school.

loans.use: to buy a new engine for her fishing boat.

loans.name: Koryun

texts.en:
Koryun is farmer living in Lernakert village of Shirak region with his wife and two children.
Koryun's wife works at the local bakery, while Koryun himself runs his farm. Because the income gathered from the farm is seasonal, Koryun also migrates to a neighbouring country in the summer. His hard and tireless work helps him to sustain his family.

Koryun requested this loan to purchase feed the livestock during the winter.
He keeps a livestock of ox, cows, sheep and hens and also cultivated potatoes and wheat. Koryun hopes to see his farm developed in the future and waits for lenders' support.

loans.use: to pay for fodder to feed the livestock during the winter

loans.name: Luz Ubeny

texts.es:
Luz, a sus 35 años de edad, vive en unión libre con su pareja. Desde hace 8 años se dedica a cultivar flores, las cuales vende a diferentes comercializadoras de flores de la región, cuenta con el apoyo de un trabajador de tiempo completo y una vez por semana contrata los servicios de otra persona. 

Durante toda su vida productiva se ha dedicado a la agricultura, pues ha tenido varios cultivos de diversos productos, pero, en vista de los bajos resultados decidió buscar otras opciones y por ello incursionó en el campo de la floricultura, con el ánimo de mejorar la entrada de recursos para el sostenimiento de su familia. 

La cliente es una mujer pujante, activa, trabajadora y perseverante, no se desanima ante las adversidades que se le presentan, manifiesta que su mayor desafío es la competencia y el bajo nivel de flujo de efectivo, dificultando así la compra de abonos y riegos necesarios para los cultivos. 

Esto lo lleva a solicitar el apoyo del crédito, con el que desea comprar abonos, riegos, fertilizantes y semillas para cultivar nuevas matas y seguir cuidando las que ya tiene sembradas, así podrá aumentar su producción y tendrá la posibilidad de incrementar su clientela, lo que se reflejará a mediano plazo en el incremento de los ingresos que recibe por la venta de sus productos. 

De esta manera, Luz tiene la oportunidad de seguir avanzando hacia el cumplimiento de su principal objetivo que es ampliar sus cultivos y cuidarlos de manera adecuada para ofrecer un producto de excelente calidad, además podrá generar más empleo, mejorando así, la calidad de vida y el bienestar de su familia y la de muchas otras personas que influyen en toda esta ardua labor.
texts.en:
Luz, 35, lives in a common-law union with her partner. For the past eight years she's worked growing flowers that she sells to various flower merchants in the region. She is helped by a full-time worker, and once a week she hires the services of another person.

Luz has earned a living in agriculture throughout her working years, cultivating various products, but in view of poor results and with the aim of earning higher income to support her family, she decided to look for other options and that led her to floriculture.

The client is a vibrant, active, hard-working, perseverant woman. She is not discouraged in front of adversities. She states that her greatest challenge is the competition, and the low cash flow that makes it difficult to buy the composts and irrigation needed for the crops. This has led her to request the support of a loan to buy compost, irrigation, fertilizers and seeds to grow new crops and to continue caring for those already sown. She will be able to increase production in this way, with a possible increase in clientele as well. In the medium term, this will bring increased income from the sales of her products.

Luz will thus have the opportunity to continue advancing towards her main goal of expanding her crops and giving them proper care, so that she can offer  excellent quality products. She will also be able to offer more work, improving the quality of life and wellbeing of her family as well as that of many other people involved in all this hard work.

loans.use: to buy compost, irrigation, fertilizers and seeds to grow new plants.

loans.name: Morefire Ladies Group

texts.en:
Alice is a 47 year old woman who has always struggled to get finance to support her business. After she heard about Thrive she had to find honest people to work with because she couldn’t access a loan if she was not in a group. They formed a group called Morefire Ladies, which signifies the robust self motivation they have. Thrive has offered them training based on business management and they are now able to make an informed decision concerning taking loans and this includes the pros and cons associated with borrowing.

Their businesses are located in the same area called Kuwadzana in Harare. Since it is a high density suburb, Alice has a huge customer base and she usually runs out of broilers to sell. She started rearing chickens about five years ago and has amassed invaluable experience. She has earned herself loyalty from her customers because they can rely on her to produce good quality chickens and good customer care. Her main challenge however, has been lack of funds to produce enough broilers to cater for all her clients.

Alice needs $300 so that she can add a batch of 100 day old chicks to meet demand as we go into the festive season. As a group, they need $1100 to be able to boost their different businesses.

loans.use: to add a batch of 100 day old chicks in a bid to meet increased seasonal demand.

loans.name: Lis

texts.en:
A 27-year-old farmer in Kampong Thom province, Lis is married and blessed with two dependent children, one of whom is in school and the other is under the age of school. Growing rice and working for others for a fee are the main income to support her family’s living. Drought and pest are challenges to her farming business.

She is now requesting a loan, which is her first time with VisionFund, to pay for tuition fees for her younger brother who pursues a bachelor degree in Marketing. She hopes that this loan will enable him to study in university until graduating and she hopes that he can help improve the family’s living conditions when he gets a job.

loans.use: to pay tuition fees for her brother who pursues a bachelor's degree in Marketing.

location.town: Kampong Thom Province, Prasat Balang district

loans.name: Martha Lucia

texts.es: Martha es una mujer de 56 años que reside en un barrio de la capital del país, ella es madre soltera de tres hijos y se ha dedicado a su negocio de cigarrería durante ocho años.  El negocio inició con el capital generado por la venta de una sala de belleza en la cual ella era socia, ella adquirió toda la indumentaria y la mercancía: licores, golosinas, jugos, empacados y demás. Martha es muy entregada a su negocio y diariamente abre a partir de las 11 a.m. hasta las 8 p.m., y sus principales clientes son visitantes del centro comercial donde se encuentra su local. Martha realizó una solicitud de crédito, un credikiva, oportunidad para vincularse a la vida financiera a través de la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, para comprar cervezas, gaseosas, licores, dulcería y comestibles. Su meta a futuro es ofrecer productos de alta calidad y tener una vejez tranquila en compañía de sus nietos.
texts.en:
Martha is a 56-year-old single mother of 3 who lives in a neighborhood in the country's capital.  For the past eight years she has made a living from her tobacco and general store.  Martha was able to start up this business with the capital that she received when she sold a beauty salon where she used to be a partner.  She acquired all of the required equipment and merchandise for the store: spirits, sweets, juices, packaged foods and others.  

Martha is very dedicated to her business, her store opens daily from 11 a.m. to 8 p.m. and her main customers are the visitors to the shopping mall where her store is located.  She requested a Kiva loan as an opportunity to obtain financing through Fundación Mario Santo Domingo.  Martha will use the money to purchase beer, soft drinks, spirits, sweets and provisions.  Her future goal is to offer high quality products and to be able to enjoy a peaceful old age with her grandchildren.

loans.use: to purchase beer, soft drinks, spirits, sweets and provisions.

loans.name: Saleh

texts.en:
Saleh is 33-year-old man from Jabalia City. He is married and father of one little son. Saleh was living with his family in a small humble house, but during the latest war on Gaza, his house was destroyed completely, so then he had to rent a small apartment in the same area.

Recently Saleh took a USD loan from Palestine for Credit and Development (FATEN) in order to rebuild his former house. The loan will allow Saleh to finalize the needed construction in a short time and return his family to their normal life.
Saleh appears in the photo.

loans.use: in order to rebuild his former house, damaged in war

loans.name: Famille Mbongo Group

texts.fr: Cette expérience de culture de riz, Mbongo s'y est lancé depuis 2011 et est conscient qu'elle participe à la survie de sa famille. Malgré qu'il se plaint de l'insuffisance du fonds alloués à cette activité, il est confiant qu'avec PAIDEK il pourra améliorer et agrandir son activité. Mbongo tient un carnet rose sur la photo.
texts.en:
Mbongo started this rice growing activity in 2011 and he is aware that it helps ensure the family's survival. Although he complains about the lack of money this activity brings in, he is confident that he will able to improve and develop his business with PAIDEK.
Mbongo is holding a pink document in the photo.

loans.use: with ploughing, transplanting, harrowing, and the purchase of pesticides.

loans.name: Famille Kizungu Group

texts.fr: C'est vers 2010 que Lévi a commencé à comprendre l'importance de la culture du riz à grande échelle. La saison dernière, ils ont réalisé, son épouse et lui, un résultat de 200$ après déduction des charges d'exploitation. Pour lui, les deux obstacles à son activité sont l'absence d'eau d'irrigation et la présence des oiseaux ravageurs dans les champs. Il souhaite agrandir son espace arable pour ainsi accroître sa production.
texts.en:
It was in around 2010 that Lévi began to understand the importance of large-scale rice growing.
Last season he made - together with his wife - a profit of $200 after deduction of production costs.
According to him, the two obstacles to his business are the lack of water for irrigation, and the presence of birds who damage the crop in the fields.

He hopes to increase his amount of arable land in order to grow his production.

loans.use: with ploughing, transplanting, fertilizer purchase, weeding and the purchase of pesticides.

loans.name: Sareth

texts.en:
Being a farmer, Sareth, who is a 57-year-old woman, can only make USD $10 per day to support her family. Sareth is residing in a rural area of Kokir Thum District, Kien Svay Province, Cambodia. She has five children. She has been a farmer more than 10 years until now.

Because it is hard to find a place to take shower, Sareth has made the decision to borrow additional capital in a Kiva loan through HKL to build one bathroom for her house. She is very happy with this loan since it will promote her standard of living. She would like to thank all lenders for their generosity in providing such a great loan for poor people like her.

loans.use: to build one bathroom.

loans.name: Lina

texts.en:
Lina is a married woman; she is 40 years old.

Lina has a dressmaking business in the Philippines. Lina requested a PHP 12,000 loan amount through NWTF to buy needles, thread and other materials needed for dressmaking.

Lina has been in this business for 12 years. She would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy needles, thread and other materials needed for dressmaking.

loans.name: Belen

texts.en:
Belen is a hardworking woman entrepreneur with three children.

She has a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 12,000 loan through NWTF in order to buy more groceries to sell.

She successfully paid back her previous loan and is now requesting a new loan to further build her business.

Belen dreams that one day she will be able to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to purchase more stock of groceries to sell.

loans.name: Margie

texts.en:
Margie is 43 years old and married with three children, two of whom are still school. She works very hard to provide for them.

Margie runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 22,000 loan through NWTF to purchase additional groceries to sell, like canned goods, noodles, spices, milk, coffee, drinks, shampoo, bread and other personal care products.

Margie has been in this business for five years.

In the future she would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase additional groceries to sell, like canned goods, noodles, spices, milk, coffee, drinks, shampoo, bread and other personal care products.

loans.name: Norys Isabel

texts.en:
Norys is 56 years old and lives in the municipality of Sincelejo. In 2003, this entrepreneur decided to start her own business so she could provide for her family. For that, she took some classes and then started making clothes as a business, something that she loves to do and wants to see improve.

She’s asking for a loan so she can buy inputs like fabrics and threads, and to pay some workers. She expects that this loan will let her increase her clients, and with this, she will improve her sales. She also wants to see her business lasting for many years and bringing her much happiness.

Be part of Norys’ story with just a loan.

loans.use: to buy inputs like fabrics and threads, and to pay some workers.

loans.name: Angel Eugenio

texts.en:
Angel is 33 years old and lives in the municipality of Tolu Viejo. He has a daughter who is 12 years old and is the light of his eyes; she’s the most important thing for him. This year, in order to give her the best life he can, he decided to start his own business, and he’s going to raise chickens, something that he has done before.

He’s asking for a loan so he can build a barn and buy 50 chickens to start his activity. He wants his business to become really successful and help him support his family; for that, he’s going to work hard to make it sustainable. He dreams of improving his house and giving his daughter a good quality of life.

Support the dreams of Angel with a loan and watch him succeed.

loans.use: to build a barn and buy 50 chickens to start his activity.

loans.name: Famille Gaston Kirongo Group

texts.fr: Malgré que la famille de Gaston se heurte à l'insuffisance de fonds, elle vient pourtant de réaliser deux ans dans la riziculture. Auparavant, Gaston s'intéressait beaucoup plus à la culture du manioc, maïs et les haricots. Au vu du constat fait à son entourage par rapport à la commercialisation du riz, il a pris l'initiative de s'y associer afin de contribuer à la gestion de son mènage.
texts.en:
Although Gaston's family faces a lack of funds, they have nonetheless just completed two years in the rice growing business.
Previously, Gaston was more interested in the cultivation of cassava, maize and beans.
Following comments from people he knows about the marketing of rice, he took the initiative to start growing it in order to contribute to the management of the household.

loans.use: with weeding, harvesting and purchasing pesticides.

loans.name: Asasio

texts.en: Asasio is married with children. He owns a mini- depot of beers,sodas and spirits for now three years. His business is doing very well, and is able to pay his children's school fees on time. He desires to expand his business to different areas. He now wants to stock beers, and sodas before the prices increases so that he can be able to sell at higher prices during Christmas season. He requests a loan facility to buy beers and sodas for selling

loans.use: to buy beers and sodas for selling.

loans.name: Ubaldo Enrique

texts.en:
Ubaldo is 55 years old and lives in the municipality of Sahagun. He has two children, a son and a daughter. They are the ones who pushed him 25 years ago to start a business that helped him to provide for them and for the whole family. He’s been raising chickens for all these years, and this business has given him a good life.

He’s asking for a loan to buy more chickens, plus food for them. He trusts that this loan will let him be more competitive and diversify his offerings. He dreams of having a successful business in his municipality, and wants to improve the conditions of his house.

A loan will help Ubaldo a lot to accomplish his goals.

loans.use: to buy more chickens, plus food for them.

loans.name: John Alexander

texts.es:
23 años de edad, una sonrisa simpática y mucho amor por su familia es lo que hoy en día proyecta John.
Se gana la vida con la preparación y venta de comidas en el municipio de Bello. De este negocio saca para pagar los gastos de su hogar.

Su fuerza y motivación la saca del amor que profesa hacia su familia.
Pide un apoyo económico con la Corporación Interactuar para la compra de insumos para la preparación  de alimentos como carne.
Esto le permitirá consolidar y aumentar su negocio en gran medida.
texts.en:
A pleasant smile, and a lot of love for his family, is what defines 23-year-old John today.

He earns his living by preparing and selling food in the town of Bello. With this business he pays for his household costs.

He gets his strength and motivation from the love he has towards his family.

He is asking for economic support from the Corporación Interactuar to buy inputs for the preparation of food, like meat.

This will allow him to largely strengthen and increase his business.

loans.use: to buy inputs for the preparation of food, like meat.

loans.name: Ruzanna

texts.en:
Ruzanna is from Panik village of Shirak region, where she lives with her husband, son, daughter--in-law and minor grandson.
Because of high unemployment rate in the region, Ruzanna's husband and son work as migrant workers in Russia most part of the year, thus Ruzanna has to take care of her farm alone. She keeps livestock of cows, oxen, sheep and hens and also cultivates wheat, beans, potatoes and carrots, while her daughter-in-law is busy with the care of the child and their house.

Ruzanna has applied for a USD 1300 loan through Kiva's field partner SEF International to buy wheat and potato seeds, and forage for feeding the livestock, to do the cultivation works and have rich harvest in the spring.

loans.use: to pay for wheat and potato seeds, and forage for feeding the livestock

loans.name: Topclass 2 Group

texts.en:
George is a 45 year old man, who is married with three children and he works as a tailor. He is enterprising, independent and very hard-working. He works in the central market of Chorkor, where most of the public and private offices are located.

George is a slim man (second on the left, wearing a shirt). George and his family live in a rented brick house, with safe drinking water, electric power and sewage services. His wish to improve his business brought him to lead the 'Top Class' group. The members' businesses are: cleaning services, selling cereal, selling stockings, selling clothing and selling snacks.

He works sewing cloth from his fixed market stall. He buys different types of cloth and sells them at retail prices. " I am much great full for the help rendered to me throughout the sustenance of my business," he says.

The advantage of his business is that he has daily sales. The disadvantage is his lack of capital for wholesale purchases of cloth. His dream is to be chosen by the market's customers, so he wants to buy more cloth wholesale to supply the seasonal customers.

This is his 5th loan from the institution in 17th years of this activity.

loans.use: to buy more cloth wholesale to supply her seasonal customers.

loans.name: Walberto Rafael

texts.en:
Alberto is 46 years old and is a married man. He lives with his wife in the municipality of Sahagun. He has four children whom he loves very much and who have become the reason why he wakes up every day to work hard to provide for his family. In 2011 he started raising chickens so he could give to his family a better life.

He’s asking for a loan so he can buy more chickens, plus some food and vitamins for them. There´s a lot of competition in the market and the inputs can be a little expensive, that’s why he asked for the loan, something he believes will help him to be more competitive and make the business last over time.

He dreams of buying a house for his family.

Help Alberto to fulfill his goals; a loan will do that for him.

loans.use: to buy more chickens, plus some food and vitamins for them.

loans.name: Elisa

texts.en:
Elisa is 44 years old and married with six children, three of whom are still in school. She works very hard to provide for them.

Elisa runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 30,000 loan through NWTF to purchase additional groceries to sell, like canned goods, noodles, spices, milk, coffee, drinks, shampoo, bread and other personal care products.

She successfully repaid her previous loan and now she has requested another loan to further build her business.

Elisa has been in this business for 16 years, and also earns additional income from fishing.

In the future Elisa would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase additional groceries to sell, like canned goods, noodles, spices, milk, coffee, drinks, shampoo, bread and other personal care products.

loans.name: Ma. Delia

texts.en:
Ma. Delia is a hardworking woman entrepreneur with two children.

She has a restaurant in the Philippines and requested a PHP 25,000 loan through NWTF in order to buy ingredients for her restaurant business.

She successfully paid back her previous loan and is now requesting a new loan to further build her business.

Ma. Delia dreams that one day, she will be able to save enough to build a house for her family.

loans.use: to buy ingredients for her restaurant business.

loans.name: Myrna

texts.en:
Myrna is 43 years old and married.

Myrna runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 13,000 loan through NWTF to purchase additional groceries to sell like canned goods, noodles, spices, milk, coffee, drinks, shampoo, bread and other personal care products.

Myrna has been in this business for two years.

In the future, Myrna would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase additional groceries to sell like canned goods, noodles, spices, milk, coffee, drinks, shampoo, bread and other personal care products.

loans.name: Reina

texts.en:
Reina is a hardworking female entrepreneur with three children. She has a vegetable vending business in the Philippines and requested a 15,000 PHP loan through NWTF in order to buy more vegetables to sell in her food stall.

She successfully paid back her previous loan and is now requesting a new loan to further build her business. Reina dreams that one day, she will be able to repair and renovate her family home.

loans.use: to buy more vegetables to sell in her food stall.

loans.name: Vahan

texts.en:
Vahan is from Abovyan town where he lives with his mother, brother and brother's family.
Vahan supports his family living with the help of agribusiness. He cultivates tomato and cauliflower and gets income by selling the harvest locally.

After his first profit started to appear, Vahan decided to enlarge his farming business. He requested this loan to purchase 6 cows, walnut seeds, cover autumn cultivation costs of workers. This will greatly support his business in farming and help him to develop it further.

Vahan ensures responsible monthly payments to the lenders and hopes for support.

loans.use: to pay for 6 cows, walnut seeds, cover autumn cultivation costs of workers

loans.name: Ingris Johana

texts.en:
Ingris is 30 years and lives in the municipality of Planeta Rica. She has 4 children, 2 boys and 2 girls between 14 and 7 years of age. It has been a complete challenge to raise her children, but she loves being a mother and feels proud of them.

Last year she started her own business, selling clothes. Her mother was the one who taught everything about this business, and she’s really grateful with her.

She wants to improve her sales and increase her clients, so she wants to stock up. She’s asking for a loan so she can buy some stock like jeans, blouses and t-shirts to increase her products to sell.

Ingris is a mother who wants to see her children become great people, and wants them to be good members of the community, that’s why she dreams with paying for the best education for them. Help her to accomplish that and more with just a loan.

loans.use: buy some inputs like jeans, blouses and t-shirts to increase her products to sell

loans.name: Narces Antonio

texts.en:
Narces is 71 years old and is a married man. He lives with his wife and four children in the municipality of Chinú. Many years ago, in 1997, he started his own business in order to provide for his family. He has a farm where he grows different kind of products, something he learned thanks to his father, who was his mentor when he was a little kid.

He’s asking for a loan so he can buy agricultural inputs like fertilizer so the quality of his produce improves. He expects that this investment will let the business grow by increasing the clients and making it sustainable. He wants to improve the conditions of his house with the profits about to come.

You can help Narces with just a loan and get him a lot closer to fulfilling all his goals.

loans.use: to buy agricultural inputs like fertilizer so the quality of his produce improves.

loans.name: Liliana

texts.en:
Liliana is 33 years old and lives in the municipality of Sincelejo. She has a daughter who is six years old and has been her biggest motivation to succeed and accomplish big things in her life. This year she decided to start her own business, and she now is the owner of a store where she sells a lot of different products. 

She’s asking for a loan so she can buy stock for her store like food, snacks, beer and alcohol. She expects that with her investment, her store will attract more clients and she will earn more profits. Her biggest dream is to see that her daughter gets the best education so her future will be full of great and positive things. 

Be part of this beautiful story of a strong and hard working woman. Help Liliana with the loan she needs.

loans.use: buy inputs like food, snacks, beers and alcohol to stock up

loans.name: Teresa

texts.en:
Teresa is a married woman who is 54 years old. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur.

Teresa has a buying and selling of rice grains business in the Philippines. Teresa requested a PHP 12,000 loan amount through NWTF to purchase more sack of rice grains to sell.

She successfully repaid her previous loan and now she has requested another loan to further build her businesses.

Teresa has been in this business for six years. She would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase more sack of rice grains to sell.

loans.name: Adriana Maria

texts.es:
Adriana, una joven de gran pasión por la naturaleza, trabaja con animales, pero no sacrificándolos ni vendiéndolos solamente, trabaja con la leche de las vacas; es tanta la admiración y respeto por los animales que prefiere que mueran por vejez antes de tener que sacrificarles para conseguir una rentabilidad por su carne. 

Es una joven con toda la energía y disposición para salir adelante.
Adriana quiere expandirse y por tal motivo tiene un dinero juntado para comprar una ternera por lo que requiere un crédito para ajustar el total del dinero.

Con la ayuda de esta ternera tendrá más producción lechera garantizando una vida económica estable para su futuro.
Sueña con tener una finca con mucho ganado rodearse de estos mamíferos que le ayudan a llevar el sustento a su familia.
texts.en:
Adriana, a young woman with a big passion for nature, makes a living with animals. But she does not slaughter them or sell them, she deals with the cow's milk. Her admiration and respect for the animals is so big that she prefers that they die of old age than to have to slaughter them to get a profit on their meat.

She is a young woman with all the energy and disposition to succeed.

Adriana wants to expand and, for that reason, she has saved some money to buy a calf. She is requesting a loan to complete the total amount of money.

She will obtain a higher milk production with this calf's help, guaranteeing an estable economic life in the future.

She dreams to own a farm with a lot of cattle and surround herself with this mammals that help her to earn a living for her family.

loans.use: to buy a calf.

loans.name: Sindy Yohana

texts.es:
Sindy, con 23 años de edad es soltera.
Actualmente se dedica a la venta de mercancía y productos para el cuidado personal, ofrece cosméticos y productos naturales, con esto ha logrado obtener recursos para aportar al sostenimiento de su hogar.

Es una joven emprendedora, con visión, dedicada y comprometida con su familia y su trabajo, siempre busca oportunidades que le permitan progresar, por esa razón solicita el crédito, con el fin de invertirlo en la compra de mercancía al por mayor para aprovechar los descuentos que le realizan y ofrecer más variedad que satisfaga los gustos y necesidades de sus clientes y así poder tener mejor margen de utilidad por las ventas. 

De esta manera, Sindy podrá avanzar hacia el cumplimiento de su objetivo primordial, que es ampliar su negocio y mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia.
texts.en:
Sindy, who is 23 years old, is single.

She now sells merchandise and products for personal care. She offers cosmetics and natural products. With this, she has managed to obtain resources to support the sustenance of her household.

She is a young entrepreneur with vision, dedicated and committed to her family and her work. She always seeks opportunities that will allow her to progress. For this reason, she is applying for the loan, with the goal of investing it in the purchase of merchandise wholesale in order to take advantage of the discounts that they give her and to offer more variety that satisfies the tastes and needs of her customers and to thus be able to have a better profit margin for her sales.

In this way, Sindy will be able to advance toward the completion of her fundamental goal, which is to expand her business and improve the quality of life of her family.

loans.use: to buy merchandise wholesale to take advantage of the discounts that they give her.

loans.name: Marelys Maria

texts.en:
Marelys is 50 years old and lives in the municipality of Sincelejo. She has three daughters whom she loves more than life, and they also have been a big support for her; they were the ones who pushed her to start her own business 10 years ago. Now she sells clothes to provide for them and her whole family.

She’s asking for a loan so she can buy clothes to sell in this end-of-the-year season. She’s aware that she has to take advantage of this season because the sales are really good. She hopes she can be more competitive in the market and can make her business last over time. She dreams of paying for the best education for her daughters.

Help Marelys with the loan she needs so she can succeed in everything she’s been working so hard for for many years.

loans.use: to buy clothes to sell in this end-of-the-year season.

loans.name: Yenny Xiomara

texts.es:
Yenny es una joven de 25 años, soltera, sin hijos, y su negocio es la venta de productos por catálogo.
Ella es emprendedora, independiente, generosa, sensible, responsable y trabajadora. 
Su negocio lo desarrolla en el municipio de Marinilla; un área estratégica porque tiene un alto flujo comercial; es una vitrina de la producción de la pequeña y mediana empresa, la zona es una muestra del panorama típico comercial e industrial de la ciudad. 
  
Su sueño es incrementar sus ingresos económicos para abrir un almacén, ella desea realizar la compra de ropa y cosmeticos al por mayor con el préstamo solicitado, para ofertar mayor variedad a sus clientes y aumentar sus ventas.
texts.en:
Yenny is a 25-year-old young woman.  She is single and doesn’t have any children.  Her business is in catalog sales.  She is enterprising, independent, generous, sensitive, responsible, and hardworking.  

She carries out her business in the town of Marinilla, a strategic area because it has a heavy flow of commercial trade.  It is a showcase for small and medium-sized business productions; that area is an example of the typical commercial and industrial panorama of the city.

Her dream is to increase her income by opening a store.  With the requested loan, she wants to purchase clothing and cosmetics in bulk in order to offer her clientele greater variety and increase her sales.

loans.use: to buy clothing and cosmetics in bulk

loans.name: Peter

texts.en: Peter is a married man. He has four children. He describes himself to be outgoing. He operates a retail business where he sells electronics. His business is located in a good area and his primary customers are locals. He describes his family challenge to be traveling a long distance to fetch water. He will use the KES 80,000 loan to buy a water pump to pump water to his home. This is his fifth loan with SMEP Microfinance Bank. The previous loans were repaid successfully.

loans.use: to buy a water pump to pump water

loans.name: Kadogo

texts.en:
Kadogo, who is in his early 40's, is married with four schooling children. He has been selling at a retail shop for one year now. He works from 6:30 am to 10 pm daily and is able to make a good monthly profit.

This will be Kadogo's tenth loan from Tujijenge Tanzania. He used the previous loans to keep increasing his retail shop inventory. He has managed to pay back all his loans successfully. He is happy with the loan. He used the profit to pay school fees, to repay the loan, to reinvest in his business and covered household expenses. He will use this loan to increase the shop inventory to meet his customers' demand. He dreams of expanding his business.

Kadogo will be accountable for paying back the loan.

loans.use: to increase his shop inventory to meet his customers' demand.

loans.name: Elizabeth

texts.en:
Elizabeth is 41 years old and lives in the municipality of Sahagun. She has two children, one son and one daughter, and they are the most important thing in her life. Some years ago she studied how to sew and after that she started her own business sewing clothes, something that has allowed her to provide for her children. Now she wants to take her business to the next level.

She’s asking for a loan so she can buy some fabric, paints and inputs for making clothes, so with this she can increase production. She expects that the investment she´s about to make will improve her sales, will help her to be more competitive and will make her business last a long time. She dreams about paying for the best education for her children.

Elizabeth dreams big, and you can help her to accomplish it all. Loan now!

loans.use: to buy some fabric, paints and inputs for making clothes, so with this she can increase production.

loans.name: Anyi Gisela

texts.es:
Anyi, de 20 años, tiene muy claro que es lo que quiere para su vida y está decidida a culminar sus estudios para salir adelante y tener una buena vida.

Ella se desempeña como vendedora de mercancía variada tales como ropa, accesorios como billeteras y algunos cosméticos, entre otros.

Esta actividad la inicio con el afán de buscar los recursos necesarios para su sostenimiento y para sus estudios.
Es una joven emprendedora y muy disciplinada.

Ella solicita un crédito para comprar un amplio surtido de mercancía y de este modo tener inventario disponible para vender a sus clientes que principalmente son estudiantes

Tiene la esperanza de poder progresar como empresaria y tener unos ingresos más estables.
texts.en:
Anyi, age 20, has a very clear idea what it is she wants for her life.  She is determined to finish her schooling in order to get ahead and have a good life.  She is an enterprising and very disciplined young woman.

She works selling a variety of merchandise such as clothing, cosmetics, and accessories such as wallets, among other items.  She began in this line of work with a desire to find the income needed to pay her own way and pay for her schooling.

She is asking for a loan to buy a generous stock of merchandise and, in this way, to have inventory available to sell to her customers, who are mainly students.

She hopes to be able to make progress as an entrepreneur and to have a more stable income.

loans.use: to buy a generous stock of merchandise

loans.name: Lucia

texts.en:
Lucia is a hardworking woman entrepreneur with two children.

She has a tailoring business in the Philippines and requested a PHP 20,000 loan through NWTF in order to buy new supplies for her tailoring business.

She successfully paid back her previous loan and is now requesting a new loan to further build her business.

Lucia dreams that one day she will be able to save enough to build a house for her family.

loans.use: to buy new supplies for her tailoring business.

loans.name: Alma

texts.en:
As a married parent of six children, Alma works hard to support her family.

She has a rice retailing business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from a general store. Alma is borrowing PHP 12,000 through NWTF to buy additional sacks of rice to sell.

Alma has been sustaining her business activities through her past three loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream of building and expanding her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy additional sacks of rice to sell

loans.name: Jinelyn

texts.en:
Jinelyn is 27 years old, married, and has two children, one of whom attends school. She works very hard to provide for them. She operates a general store in the Philippines, which she has been doing for three years.

Jinelyn requested a loan from NWTF for 12,000 PHP, which she will use to buy items to sell such as shampoo, groceries, milk, coffee, spices, bread, and personal care products. In the future, she would like to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to purchase items to sell such as shampoo, groceries, milk, coffee, spices, bread, and personal care products

loans.name: Javier De Jesus

texts.en:
Javier is 47 years old and lives in the municipality of Dabeiba. He has a son who is 12 years old and whom he loves very much. Looking for a way to provide for his son and his family, he started a business. He’s raising chickens, something that he learned thanks to his father, and which now he wants to improve.

He’s asking for a loan so he can build a barn and buy more chickens to raise. His main objective is to optimize the operation of his business so it can become more productive. He expects that his business will let him pay for a quality education for his son, because he wants to see him as a professional in the future.

He’s asking for a little help, and you, with a loan, can be the answer he’s been looking for.

loans.use: to  build a barn and buy more chickens to raise.

loans.name: Ana Rocio

texts.en:
Ana is 42 years old and lives in the municipality of Dabeiba. Five years ago she decided to start a new business with the help of her boyfriend, and she’s raising pigs. This is the only job she has to provide for her family, and, unfortunately, there’s a lot of competition in the market, but she wants to make her business successful.

She’s asking for a loan so she can buy food for the pigs she has and to buy some fertilizers and pesticide for some crops she’s starting. She hopes that with this investment she can get more profits and can make her business sustainable. She dreams of improving the conditions of her house so her family can live better.

You can help Ana with just a loan and watch how her life will start changing positively.

loans.use: to buy food for the pigs she has and to buy some fertilizers and pesticide for some crops she’s starting.

loans.name: Yuliana Patricia

texts.en:
Yuliana is 25 years old and lives in the municipality of Cañasgordas. When she was a little girl, her mother taught her some farm work, something really traditional in her family. Now, in order to give some new outcomes to her family, she wants to start raising pigs, something she hopes gives her and her family a better quality of life.

She’s asking for a loan so she can start her business by buying pigs, food for them and to build the pigsty. She’s convinced that she’s going to work hard to make her business last a long time. She dreams that this business will let her pay for her children's education, which is the most important thing for her, to give them a great future.

Yuliana wants your help. Loan now and let her get closer to accomplishing her dreams.

loans.use: start her business by buying pigs, food for them and to build the pigsty

loans.name: Marisol

texts.es: Marisol es una humilde mujer de 50 años que reside en Bogotá en compañía de su cónyuge y sus tres hijos, ella hizo realidad su sueño de tener su propio negocio con el apoyo de un programa de gobierno que le proporcionó los enseres necesarios para iniciar su tienda de víveres, ella recibió unas vitrinas y un enfriador para conservar los lácteos, carnes, verduras y bebidas, y posteriormente con sus ahorros surtió su negocio con víveres, productos de aseo en distintas presentaciones, golosinas y demás.  Hoy en día cuenta con cuatro años en el negocio y muy buenos resultados, es por ello que para incrementar los inventarios de su negocio realizó una solicitud de crédito, un credikiva, oportunidad para vincularse a la vida financiera a través de la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo y comprar frutas y verduras, productos de aseo, víveres, legumbres, lácteos y abarrotes. Su meta a futuro es adquirir casa propia y ampliar la oferta de productos en su negocio.
texts.en:
Marisol is a humble, 50-year-old woman who lives in Bogotá along with her partner and her three children.  

She made her dream of having her own business come true with the support of a government program that equipped her with the essential tools needed to launch her grocery store.  She received some display cabinets and a refrigerator case to store dairy products, meats, vegetables, and drinks.  Later, with her savings, she stocked her business with groceries, different types of cleaning products, snacks, and everything else.  

These days she has been in business for four years and has had great results.  It is because of this that she is requesting a loan in order to increase her business’s inventory.  She is asking for a Kiva loan as an opportunity to establish a credit history through Fundación Mario Santo Domingo and buy fruits and vegetables, cleaning products, supplies, beans, dairy products, and groceries.  

Her future goal is to get her own house and to expand the products she offers in her store.

loans.use: to buy fruits and vegetables, cleaning products, supplies, beans, dairy products, and groceries.

loans.name: Victor Manuel

texts.en:
Victor is 26 years old and lives in the municipality of Frontino. His family is going through a rough time economically speaking, which is the reason why he made the decision to start his own business. He’s going to raise fish to sell later. A friend of his trained him so he could do that job.

He’s asking for a loan so he can build the ponds and buy fish to raise and food for them. The most important thing about his business is to make it last a long time so it helps to solve the economic issues of his family. He dreams that one day the business will let him buy a house where his whole family can have a great life.

Victor needs some support to accomplish his dreams. You can loan now and see how they will become true.

loans.use: build the ponds and buy fish to raise and food for them.

loans.name: Erika Viviana

texts.en:
Erika is 25 years old and lives in the municipality of Mariquita. She has a little daughter who only is five years of age. The years have passed since she also started her own business, just to provide for her baby daughter. She has a farm where she grows different kinds of products, something that her grandfather taught her to do.

She’s asking for a loan so she can buy chocolate seeds and fertilizers for other productions she already has. She expects that this investment will let her improve her sales and make her grow bigger. She dreams of her daughter having an excellent education so she grows up as a smart and successful woman.

You can be part of Erika’s story. Loan now and watch her accomplish all her dreams.

loans.use: to buy chocolate seeds and fertilizers for other productions she already has.

loans.name: Maria Del Transito

texts.es:
María, de 67 años de edad, no fue a la escuela, sus hijos ya están acompañados y ella vive sola en su casa. 

María, tiene una pequeña venta de jugos y bebidas en su casa, ella tiene este negocio desde hace seis años y es a través de esa venta que genera los ingresos para cubrir sus necesidades; ella antes vendía comida típica, pero luego ya no pudo salir a vender;.                                                                                                                                                                                                                       María, necesita el préstamo para comprar frutas para hacer los jugos, gaseosas, pan, café, entre otros insumos para su negocio. 

María, sueña con mejorar su vivienda para tener más comodidades.
texts.en:
67-year-old Maria did not go to school. Her children have already left the home and she now lives alone. 

Maria has a small juice and soft drink shop in her house. She has had this business for 6 years and it provides the income to cover her necessities. She sold traditional dishes before, but at one point was no longer able to go out and sell them. 

Maria needs a loan to buy fruits to make juice, as well as soft drinks, bread, coffee and other items for her business.

Maria dreams with improving her home to live more comfortably.

loans.use: to buy fruits, soft drinks, bread, coffee, and other items for her business.

loans.name: Elizabeth

texts.en:
Elizabeth is a married woman with five children. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. She is 41 years old and has two children who are still in school.

Elizabeth has a buy-and-sell rice business in the Philippines. She requested a PHP 10,000 loan amount through NWTF to buy additional sacks of rice to sell.

Elizabeth has been in this business for five years. She would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy additional sacks of rice to sell

loans.name: John Fredy

texts.en:
John is 40 years old and lives in the municipality of La Ceja. He has two sons who are the motor of his life, and they were the ones who pushed him to start his own business five years ago, raising cattle. Now his sons are men and he needs to pay for their professional study, which is the reason why he wants to improve his business.

He’s asking for a loan that lets him buy a milk cow. He’s convinced that with this new cow he will increase his clients and sales, and with those, the profits will improve too. He dreams of paying for his children's education and buying his own house where they all can have a good life.

Help John with the loan he needs and watch him accomplish great things.

loans.use: buy a milk cow.

loans.name: Fatima

texts.en:
Fatima is a 39-year-old married lady who has been providing beauty services from her house since 2011. She is a hardworking lady who is putting much effort into developing her business in addition to her social and financial living.

Fatima is acquiring a loan from Kiva's field partner Al Majmoua, to start beauty products wholesale trade in addition to her current beauty service business.
Fatima is looking forward to move her hair dressing and makeup business to a separate beauty salon outside her house, and will make sure to provide her customers with the best updated services.

loans.use: to start a beauty products wholesale trade in addition to her current beauty service business.

loans.name: Layla

texts.en:
Layla is a 35-year-old divorced lady. In March, 2015 she established her current newly established clothes selling business. She has twelve years of experience in her domain and is working hard to develop it as much as she can. She is looking for external financial support to help her in developing it.

Thus for this reason, she is requesting a loan from Kiva's field partner Al Majmoua, to increase her business merchandise with special Autumn and Winter newly released collections.
Layla is looking forward to move to a better place with better decoration and location to attract more customers.

loans.use: to increase her business merchandise with special Autumn and Winter newly released collections.

loans.name: Enadis Milena

texts.es:
Enadis es una persona muy trabajadora que gracias a su esfuerzo diario ha logrado sacar adelante a sus 4 hijos brindándoles una educación de buena calidad.

Enadis es madre soltera y desde hace mucho tiempo comenzó a vender ropa y calzado, con gran esfuerzo a superado muchos problemas que se le han presentado.

Actualmente Enadis tiene unos muy buenos pedidos por parte de sus clientes y debido a que no cuenta con un gran capital busca un préstamo para comprar mercancía la por mayor y responder a los grandes pedidos que tiene de sus clientes.
Le dedica 10 horas diarias a su negocio.

Su mayor sueño es salir adelante con su negocio y desde este poder ofrecerles a sus hijos una buena calidad de vida y una mejor estabilidad económica, sabe que de la mano de Interactuar podrá lograrlo.
texts.en:
Enadis is a very hardworking person who through her efforts has managed to get her four children ahead by offering them a good quality education. She is a single mother. She has been selling clothing and shoes for a long time, and with great effort has overcome many obstacles in her way.

Currently Enadis has very good orders from her customers, and since she has not got much capital she is seeking a loan to buy merchandise at wholesale in response to the large number of orders from her customers. 

She spends ten hours a day at her business. Her biggest dream is for her business to get ahead, and this way she will be able to offer her children a good quality of life and greater financial stability. She knows that hand in hand with Interactuar she will be able to accomplish this.

loans.use: to buy merchandise at wholesale.

loans.name: Siyabonga Group

texts.en:
In 2010, Priscilla’s life reached a crisis point. She had just completed that sad chapter in her life of getting divorced when she was laid off at the local bank she was working for.
By chance, she listened to a radio program that asked questions relating to what they have been presenting with $50 worth of airtime vouchers as the prize. To her surprise, she got all the answers right and walked away with the capital that she used to start her business in 2010.

Priscilla is a 38 year old single, divorced parent and has 1 child. She is a member of a group called Siyabonga (translated from vernacular means THANK YOU). The group consists of 5 members who all reside in the same community in Harare.

Priscilla sold the $50 worth of airtime and retained the capital in the business, she quickly identified that airtime business was worth venturing into and she sourced some additional capital from relatives to restock in bulk. She operated her business earnestly and her profits gradually increased and she took account of every single cent in her business. Priscilla was able to open another airtime selling point within a period of a year that is in 2011 and she employed someone.

She operated the 2 airtime selling points for 2 years and in 2013 she applied to become an Eco-cash agent. She had managed to raise the minimum capital requirements of $500 and she was successful in her application. Due to its convenient nature people flocked at her operating space to seek the various services offered by Eco-cash.

Down the line in 2014 she applied for to become a Telecash agent, another money transfer service. With 2 sites fully functioning both selling airtime and mobile money transfer services, profits increased dramatically. She indicated that she enjoys her trade since it allows her to mix with a lot of people and that makes her happy all the time.

Priscilla requires a loan of $500, with the loan she intends to insert it into the 3 businesses floats. This will enable her business to expand greatly so that she can be able to take care of herself and her child adequately.

loans.use: to increase her float for use as a money transfer agent and to increase the range of telephone network cards she can sell.

loans.name: Irene

texts.en:
Thirty-one-year-old Irene owns and runs a sari-sari (variety) store. She sells commodities such as noodles, milk, sugar, seasonings, soap, shampoo, and assorted canned goods. She is a married woman with one young dependent. Her husband works in a government office. Together with her family, she resides in the rural town of Dulag.

She has been running a sari-sari (variety} store for four years now, serving neighbors and nearby residents. She needs additional capital to fill those items that are out of stock. That is why she joined CEVI to avail herself of financial services.

Irene has requested a loan to buy stock such as frozen goods, soft drinks, and beverages. These will cause her to improve her daily earnings. In that way, slowly it will help improve her family’s living condition.

Irene is hoping, and she would like to strive hard, to expand her sari-sari store for a sustainable livelihood.

loans.use: to buy stock such as frozen goods, soft drinks, and beverages.

loans.name: Marites

texts.en:
Marites is a married woman with two children. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. Marites is 36 years old, and both of her children are in school.

Marites has a frozen food retailing business in the Philippines. She has been in this business for ten years. She requested a PHP 10,000 loan amount through NWTF in order to buy more frozen foods to sell.

In the future, Marites would like to save enough money to expand her business and repair her family home.

loans.use: to buy more frozen foods to sell.

loans.name: Angela Patricia

texts.es:
Angela de 38 años de edad, es una mujer trabajadora, dedicada a su familia y una gran soñadora. Desde su infancia su mayor deseo fue convertirse en una microempresaria y con esfuerzo y disciplina ha llegado a cumplirlo. 

Hoy trabaja en su carro de comidas, la cual abre diariamente de siete de la mañana a ocho de la noche y se dedica a la venta de toda clase de fritos, mecatos y bebidas.

Espera poder dar a conocer su negocio en toda la localidad y establecerlo como uno de los mejores. Con el objeto de lograr sus sueños, Angela se encuentra solicitando un crédito que invertirá en la compra de surtido de ingredientes con el objeto de ampliar su portafolio de productos y poder satisfacer el nivel de demanda actual. 

Espera poder mejorar su condición económica y la calidad de vida de su familia.
texts.en:
38-year old Angela is hardworking, dedicated to her family, and a dreamer. Ever since she was a small child, her greatest wish was to be a small businesswoman. With a lot of effort and discipline she has achieved her goal.

Today Angela runs a food cart. She starts work at 7 am and finishes at 8 pm daily. She sells all kinds of fried food, pastries, and drinks. Her hope is for her business to become known throughout the district as one of the best places to eat.

In order to succeed in this goal, Angela is now seeking a loan to buy ingredients and expand the range of food she offers so she can meet current demands. She hopes to improve her financial situation and her family's standard of living.

loans.use: buy more ingredients to she can expand the range of food she offers

loans.name: Artak

texts.en:
Artak is 40 years old farmer living in Spandaryan village. He lives with his wife and their three school aged chidlren, all of them attending the local village school.
Artak does different construction jobs, but most of the time he spends working on his farm. He keeps hens, oxen and also cultivates potatoes, carrots and beans. His wife finds time to help out Artak on the farm, while also his wife and daughter-in-law are busy with the care of the children and their big house.

Artak has requested this loan to purchase 0.7 hectares of land to enlarge cultivation of fruits and vegetables in the farm. Because of limited land resources Artak is not able to enlarge the variety of fruits and vegetables produces, so he hopes to receive the support from Kiva lenders and have a larger amount land to cultivate.

loans.use: to pay for 0.7 hectares of land to enlarge cultivation of fruits and vegetables in the farm

loans.name: Van's Group

texts.en:
Van, 32 years old, is a Thai ethnic woman. She has been participating in the program of M7-MFI’s forerunner since 2011. She currently lives with her husband and her two sons in Mai Son district, Son La district.

Her family lives mainly on cultivation and the income is just enough to cover the living expenses of the family and a small saved amount. She currently wants to borrow a loan to buy fertilizer for corns and rice, but the saved amount is not enough. Therefore, she wants to borrow a loan for this purpose.

She hopes that the loan amount will help the corns and rice develop well, bringing an abundant harvest to her family so that she can have money to repay the loan for M7-MFI on time.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer

loans.name: Thita

texts.en: Thita is a 21-year-old single freshman and she resides with her parents in the Kampong Cham Province of Cambodia. Her father is a rice farmer and her mother is a civil servant. She is pursuing a bachelor’s degree, majoring in accounting and finance at university in the province. Due to a shortage of money to pay her tuition fees from the first to the fourth year, she has decided to secure a loan. With the loan, Thita will graduate successfully with skills for her future job. After graduation, Thita wants a good job with a reasonable salary, so she will be able to help her family. She also wants to save money to build a proper house and if she gets children she wants her children to study to pursue bachelor’s degrees.

loans.use: to pay her tuition fees from the first to the fourth year

loans.name: Fortaleza Del Sur Group

texts.es:
La A.C. “FORTALEZA DEL SUR” iniciará el primer ciclo en Pro Mujer, como parte del Centro Focal Alto Lima, está compuesta por ocho  integrantes y está dirigida por una mesa directiva donde la señora Mariela es la Secretaria. Los negocios que las integrantes de la asociación comunal llevan adelante son variados entre ellos existen: venta de chompas, venta de coca, venta de comida, venta de zapatos, venta de salchipapa, servicio de transporte, venta de verduras, venta de flores. 

El crédito que sacaran beneficiara a pequeñas microempresarias donde la señora Mariela es integrante, ella indica que integra Pro Mujer por la invitación de su cuñada que es cliente de la institución. En la actualidad ella tiene un negocio de venta de chompas; da a conocer que este negocio lo aprendió de su mamá y lo inicio de forma independiente hace varios años. 

El crédito que ahora sacará será para el aumento de capital (compra de chompas por mayor) que adquirirá de las vendedoras mayoristas de la ciudad de La Paz y posteriormente lo comercializará en las ferias de la ciudad de El Alto. Esta forma de trabajo le permite generar recursos para apoyar a su familia económicamente, ya que ella es soltera.  

Cuando se le consulta qué le gusta de Pro Mujer, ella responde que le gusta la capacitación que ofrece la institución.
texts.en:
"Fortaleza del Sur" communal bank will begin its first Pro Mujer loan cycle as part of the Centro Focal Alto Lima. It is made up of eight members, and it is run by a board of directors in which señora Mariela is the secretary.

The businesses that the members are engaged in are varied. Among them are the sale of sweaters, coca, food, shoes, "salchipapa" [a popular fast-food dish of fried potatoes and hot dogs], vegetables, flowers, and transportation services.

The loan that they take out will benefit the micro-businesses that señora Mariela is a part of. She points out that she was invited to be a part of Pro Mujer by her sister-in-law who is a client of that institution. Currently she has a business selling sweaters. She says that she learned this business from her mother, and started out on her own a few years ago.

The loan that she will now take out will be to increase her capital to buy sweaters at wholesale. She will buy them from the wholesalers around the city of La Paz and later sell them at the markets of the city of El Alto. This work allows her to generate income to support her family financially, since she is single.

When asked what she likes about Pro Mujer, she replies that she likes the training that this institution offers.

loans.use: to buy sweaters at wholesale.

loans.name: Morn

texts.en:
Morn is 63 years old and has six children. He lives in a rural area of Bakan District, Pursat Province, Cambodia. To make a living, he works as a farmer on a small rice field near his house, which he has been doing for 20 years. He earns $5 per day.

Morn requested a loan from HKL, which he will use to build a hygienic latrine for the sake of his family members.

loans.use: to build a hygienic latrine

loans.name: Argemiro Antonio

texts.es:
Argemiro tiene 25 años, es soltero. Hace 2 años realiza se desempeña como agricultor, pues le ayudaba a sus padres en los cultivos que poseían, desde entonces fue adquiriendo conocimientos y experiencia en la labor. 

Tiene sus propios cultivos de frutas, la producción que obtiene de las cosechas, es vendida para obtener los recursos necesarios para apoyar en su hogar.

El cliente es un hombre honrado, juicioso, dedicado a su familia y a su labor, pues esto lo motiva para trabajar con más empeño y conseguir lo que se propone. 

Actualmente solicita el apoyo del crédito, que invertirá en la compra de abonos, riegos, fertilizantes y fungicidas para continuar con su labor y cuidar sus cultivos, esto le ayudará a cosechar productos de mejor calidad y podrá aumentar los ingresos que genera por cada venta. 

Es así como Argemiro desea mantener sus cultivos, para que sea un negocio sostenible y perdurable en el tiempo, que le brinde la oportunidad de salir adelante.
texts.en:
Argemiro is 25 years old and single. Two years ago he began working as a farmer, helping his parents with their crops, and has been acquiring knowledge and experience in the field ever since.

He has his own fruit crops, which he sells to obtain the resources necessary to help support his household.

Argemiro is an honest, sensible man, who is devoted to his family and his work, which motivates him to work harder and achieve his goals.

He is currently requesting a loan to invest in the purchase of fertilizers, irrigation, manure, and fungicides to continue his work and care for his crops, which will help him reap better quality products and will increase the revenue generated by each sale.

Argemiro wants to maintain his crops to create a sustainable and enduring business, which will afford him the opportunity to succeed.

loans.use: to purchase of fertilizers, irrigation, manure, and fungicides to continue his farm work and maintain his crops.

loans.name: Virginia

texts.en:
For the past three years, Virginia has engaged in hog raising as a livelihood. She raises and sells pigs to the locals in her place. She is a fifty-nine year old, single woman. She resides in the town of Tolosa.

She wants to improve the quality of livestock she is about to raise, but unfortunately she has very limited capital for doing so.

Virginia has requested a loan to buy pig feed and supplements. These could help enhance her source of income and slowly enable her to settle her obligation.

She is thankful for the funds and is determined to manage them successfully to become financially stable in the future.

loans.use: to buy pig feed and supplements.

loans.name: Eloina Del Carmen

texts.es:
Ser la única vendedora de mercancía de productos para el hogar, es una gran ventaja para sacar su negocio adelante y una plataforma para que Eloina prospere y se anime a triunfar en el emprendimiento y en el difícil mercado. 

Su principal dificultad es la falta de capital para comprar mercancía y por ello quiere solicitar un crédito para comprar productos para el hogar como platos, utensilios de cocina, entre otros y de este modo impulsar el uso de estos productos entre sus conocidos y gente del barrio. 

Su principal sueño es tener un negocio estable, un local comercial, mejorar ventas, y que este negocio le dé estabilidad económica y lo suficiente para cubrir las necesidades de su familia.
texts.en:
Being the only vendor of products for the home is a great advantage for moving her business forward, and it is a platform for Eloina to prosper and be motivated to triumph in her business venture and in the difficult market.

Her principal difficulty is the lack of capital to buy merchandise, and for this reason she wants to apply for a loan to buy products for the home, such as plates and cooking utensils, among other items, and in this way motivate the use of these products among her acquaintances and people of the neighborhood.

Her principal dream is to have a stable business and a commercial location, to improve sales, and to have this business give her economic stability and sufficient [income] to cover the needs of her family.

loans.use: to buy products for the home, such as plates and cooking utensils, among other items.

loans.name: Jose Gabriel

texts.es:
Jose un padre de dos hermosas y adorables niñas,  a las cuales ama y da la vida por ellas, se dedica a la venta de mercancía, una actividad que inicio por gusto al trabajo independiente que descubrió cuando era estudiante y vendía cosas a sus amigos, aprendió solo de esta labor.

Trabaja diariamente durante 10 horas y quiere solicitar un crédito para la compra de surtido de cosméticos y productos para el cuidado personal, de esta forma podrá abastecer su negocio y su inventario. 

Su mayor objetivo en su vida se centra en sus hijas y es poder darles una buena calidad de vida y pagar su educación.
texts.en:
Jose is the father of two beautiful and adorable little girls whom he loves with all his heart.

He is a salesman, a job he started because he likes being independent. He realised this when he was a student and used to sell items to his friends. He learned how to do this without input from anyone else.

Jose works ten hours daily. He is seeking a loan to buy more stock: cosmetics and personal healthcare items. Then he will be able to better stock his business and have more inventory. His goals in life centre on his daughters; he wishes to give them a better standard of living and pay for their education.

loans.use: buy more cosmetics and personal healthcare products

loans.name: Vien's Group

texts.en:
Vien, 35 years old, currently lives with her husband and her two children, one son and one daughter, in Mai Son district, Son La province.

Her family’s main income is from coffee trees and longan trees. In addition, she and her husband are hired workers for other people. The education fees of her children cost her and her husband much. The grafted longan trees will be harvested next year. The coffee has been harvested but has not been sold yet. She wants to borrow a loan to cover their children’s education fees.

She hopes that the loan amount will help her children have good education so they will have a good life in the future. She and her husband will work hard to get money to repay the loan on time.

loans.use: to cover her children’s education fees.

loans.name: Thuong

texts.en:
Mrs. Thuong is 58 years old. She is married and has two children, so she works very hard to provide for them. Her family’s income is mainly from husbandry.

She is interested to improve the living standard for her family so she really needs the loan to build a toilet.

loans.use: to build a latrine to improve the health of her family.

loans.name: Lina Yamara

texts.en:
Lina is 35 years old and has two children. She lives in the municipality of Medellin. Since she was a little girl, she always hoped to have her own business and a family to provide for, and now she has both. She operates a general store, which she has been doing for three years. 

Lina works a lot in her store, not only to give to her family a good quality of life, but because she loves what she does and wants to see her store as a successful and recognized one. She wants to improve her sales and to increase the profits. Lina requested a loan, which she will use to buy some showcases and general stock items. 

Lina wants the best for her children and hopes to pay for a good education for all of them; she also would like to improve her house.

loans.use: to purchase some showcases and general  stock items

loans.name: Chuan's Group

texts.en:
Chuan, 26 years old, is a Thai ethnic minority man. He currently lives with his wife and his little daughter in Mai Son district, Son La province.

His family’s main income is from a glass and aluminum business and cultivation. The income is just enough to cover the living expenses of the family and a small saved amount. He wants to repair the house of his family but the saved amount is not enough to buy building materials to do so. Therefore, he wants to borrow a loan for this purpose.

He hopes that the loan amount will help his family have better living conditions and a spacious house.

loans.use: to repair his house.

loans.name: Bac's Group

texts.en:
Mrs. Bac, born in 1977, has even just joined in the program of M7-MFI, but she is always an example in compliance with the regulations and policies of M7-MFI. She currently lives with her husband and her three children, two daughters and one son, in Mai Son district, Son La province.

Her family’s main income is from planting vegetables for sale, so the income is just enough to cover the living expense of the family and save a small amount. She wants to repair her house, but the saved amount is not enough to do so. Therefore, she wants to borrow a loan to buy building materials for repairing her house.

She hopes that the loan amount will help her family have a good house, which will encourage her and her husband to keep their minds on their work and on feeding their children. They will work hard to get money to repay the loan from M7-MFI on time.

loans.use: to repair her house.

loans.name: Phuong3738's Group

texts.en:
Mrs. Phuong, born in 1963, has been participating in the program of M7-MFI’s forerunner since 2005. She is always an exemplary member. Her family has two children, but the children are all grown up and moved to live separately from her. She currently lives in Mai Son district, Son La province.

Her family’s main income is from breeding pigs and sales of groceries. She confides that since she joined in the program of M7-MFI, she has escaped the big difficulty in the lack of capital. She can be more proactive in the capital, so the breeding and grocery sales are more favorable. Her family currently raises thirty pigs to take meat, and five sows. She wants to borrow a loan to buy food for the pigs and sows.

Phuong hopes that the loan amount will help her family sell pig herds on time, and that the sows will produce small, heathy pigs. This will bring a good profit to her family to continue develop the breeding model and have money to repay the loan from M7-MFI on time.

loans.use: to buy food for the pigs and sows.

loans.name: Sombrerito Group

texts.es:
Griselda es una joven mujer de 21 años de edad, vive con su pareja, tiene un hijo de 2 años, y su negocio es la venta de comida tradicional.

Ella es buena oyente, solidaria y muy fuerte. Su negocio lo realiza en la localidad ‘el torno’ caracterizada por ser el centro de acopio de la producción agropecuaria del lugar.
Griselda es de tez morena, cabello negro lo usa largo y baja estatura (de pie, la primera de la derecha, viste blusa negra con flores rosas), su lengua materna es el Guaraní que se habla en el lugar y habla español por cultura general y por el negocio que realiza. Su vida la comparte con su pareja que se dedica a la agricultura y con su hijo que aún no está en edad escolar, viven en un cuarto propiedad de la familia construido de madera con techo de calamina que cuenta con energía eléctrica no tiene agua potable ni alcantarillado porque los servicios aún no llegan al lugar.  Su negocio es la venta de comida tradicional como; ‘El majadito de charque’ que es uno de las comidas más tradicionales porque se prepara a base de charque (carne deshidratada), arroz, plátano y yuca fritos, se puede comer caliente o frío, “cocino el majadito con su yuca, eso se está perdiendo porque la gente prefiere comida chatarra, vendo con mucha deficiencia porque tenemos necesidades, las mesas son sencillas, no son de restaurante, nos faltan hartas comodidades, no tenemos agua, el ambiente es muy caliente…” comenta. Su negocio es exitoso porque existen pocas vendedoras de comida tradicional. La ventaja de su negocio es que no cuenta con competencia directa, la desventaja es la falta de insumos de cocina para cocinar a diario. Su sueño es darle estudios a su hijo, ella desea comprar insumos de cocina como, aceite, arroz, fideo, verduras, carne y otros. Esta es la 2 secuencia de préstamos con la institución en 2 años que vende comida tradicional.

Es por esos motivos que Griselda solicita un préstamo para comprar insumos de cocina para vender comida tradicional.
texts.en:
Griselda is a young woman aged 21, she lives with her life partner, she has a 2-year-old child and she engages in selling traditional food.

She is a good listener, and she is a caring and very strong person. Her activity is located in an area called “El Torno”, the main collection center for the farming production of the area.

Griselda is dark-skinned, she is short with long, dark hair (she is the first from the right, standing and dressed in a black blouse with pink flowers). A native speaker of Guaraní – the language of her town – she also speaks Spanish as part of the general culture and to conduct her business. She shares her life with her partner, who engages in agriculture, and with her son who does not yet go to school. They live in a room owned by her family: it is made of wood, it has a metal sheet roof, and they have electricity but neither drinking water nor sewers system, as these services are yet to reach the area they live in.
