В данный момент из-за кризиса они продали всех животных. Рахиме сейчас нужно купить несколько голов телят, однако для этого у них нет достаточных денег, и по этой причине она обратилась за кредитом. Рахима очень нуждается в вашей поддержке.
texts.en:
Meet Rahima, a quiet and honest 28-year-old married woman and the mother of four children.  Her husband works as a handyman and renovates houses.  Rahima herself sews women's dresses.  She's been involved in this activity for 10 years already.  Rahima is also involved in animal husbandry, an activity which means a lot to her because it provides her family with all their dairy products.

At the moment, because of the economic crisis, Rahima and her husband have had to sell all their livestock.  Rahima needs to buy a few new calves but the family doesn't have enough money to make this purchase.  For this reason, Rahima is taking a loan.  She really needs your support.

loans.use: to purchase a few calves.

loans.name: Patricia Del Carmen

texts.es: Patricia cuenta con 27 años de edad y vive con su compañero de vida y sus dos hijos de 5 y 1 año de edad, a los que siempre buscan la manera de salir adelante. Ella es una mujer que muestra cada día su tenacidad, ganándose la vida con su venta de pan, actividad que realiza desde hace 2 años y que le permite llevar el sustento a su hogar. Patricia desea encementar el piso de su vivienda, ya que este es de tierra y provoca enfermedades respiratorias a su familia, por lo que solicita un crédito a FUSAI para comprar: cemento, arena, grava y hierro para encementar el piso de su vivienda.
texts.en:
Patricia, 27, lives with her life companion and her two children, 5 and 1, for whom they are always looking for ways to get ahead. She is a woman who shows her tenacity every day earning a living selling bread, an activity she has been doing for two years and which permits her to bring sustenance to her home.

Patricia would like to pave the floor of her residence since it is now dirt and causes respiratory diseases for her family. For this reason, she is requesting a loan from FUSAI in order to buy cement, sand, gravel, and rebar to pave the floor of her residence.

loans.use: to buy cement, sand, gravel, and rebar to pave the floor of her residence.

loans.name: Jose Emir

texts.es: .José de 35 años de edad que habita en vivienda propia en compañía de su esposa y sus dos hijos de 2 y 5 años de edad. Él es un hombre trabajador que se gana la vida como jornalero y además posee una pequeña panadería en la que elabora pan francés para la venta, de esa manera le ha brindado lo necesario a sus hijos para el crecimiento y desarrollo, además provee los insumos básicos del hogar. José desea realizar reparaciones en el techo de su vivienda la cual está deteriorada y permite el ingreso de los implementos del clima lo que puede afectar la salud de su familia, es por eso que solicita un crédito a FUSAI para invertir en: la compra de lámina, tornillos, polines, mano de obra, etc., para realizar las reparaciones debidas en la vivienda.
texts.en:
José, who is 35 years old, lives in his own home in the company of his wife and their two children, ages 2 and 5. He is a hard-working man who earns a living as a day worker, and in addition he has a little bakery in which he makes French bread to sell. In this way he has offered his children the necessities for growth and development. He also provides the basic supplies for the household.

José wants to make repairs on the roof of his house, which is deteriorated and allows the weather to enter, which can affect the health of his family. It is for this reason that he is applying to FUSAI for a loan to invest in the purchase of metal sheeting, bolts, and purlins and pay for labor to make suitable repairs on his home.

loans.use: to invest in the purchase of metal sheeting, bolts, and purlins and pay for labor to make the proper repairs on his house.

loans.name: Laura

texts.es: Laura es una mujer trabajadora que a sus 30 años de edad se dedica a la venta de verduras, además vende productos de primera necesidad en su vivienda, con  lo cual logra sostener a su familia. Ella vive en casa de su propiedad desde hace varios años, junto a sus dos hijos de 7 y 4 años de edad, ya que es madre soltera su empeño en salir adelante es mayor. Lura desea mejorar el techo de su vivienda, el cual en época de invierno presenta filtraciones, por lo que solicita un crédito a FUSAI para comprar: lámina galvanizada, madera, clavos y cemento para mejorar el techo de su vivienda y brindar protección a sus hijos.
texts.en: Laura is a hardworking 30 year old woman who sells vegetables and staple products from her home. This is how she supports her family. She lives in a house she has owned for several years with her two children aged 7 and 4. She is a single mother and she really works hard to get ahead.  Laura wants to improve the roof on her home because during the rainy season there are leaks. That is why she is asking FUSAI for a loan to buy galvanized sheeting, wood, nails, and cement to improve the roof on her home and protect her children.

loans.use: to buy galvanized sheeting, wood, nails, and cement to improve the roof on her house and protect her children.

loans.name: Mercedes

texts.es: Mercedes tiene 48 años de edad y se dedica a la venta de tamales de gallina, dicha actividad le permite apoyar con los gastos económicos de su hogar. Ella vive junto a su esposo y sus 2 hijas de 19 y 12 años de edad, a las que apoya para que estudien, ya que siempre busca la manera de ofrecerles lo mejor, por ello, también ha decidido solicitar un crédito a FUSAI para comprar: lámina, madera, clavos ya alambre para reparar el techo de la galera, ya que esta la protege de la lluvia.
texts.en:
Mercedes is 48 years old and earns a living selling chicken tamales. This activity allows her to support her family's economic expenses.

She lives with her husband and their two children who are 19 and 12 years old. She supports them with their schooling because she's always searching for ways to give them the best.

Because of this, she's also decided to seek a loan from FUSAI to buy sheets, wood, nails and wire to repair the kitchen roof, which protects her from rain.

loans.use: to buy sheets, wood, nails and wire to repair the kitchen roof, which protects from rain.

loans.name: Marcela

texts.en:
Marcela earns a living by weaving nipa (a kind of palm) leaves that are commonly used as a roof in the native houses in the Philippines. She has been weaving nipa for six years now. She is a hardworking 59-year-old woman and has six grown children. Her husband is a carpenter.

She wants to continue to improve her quality of life, which is why she is requesting a loan with CEVI to purchase more nipa (palm) leaves. That will enable her to continue to produce more products to be sold.

Marcela used the previous loan to expand her business and wants to continue doing so.

loans.use: to  purchase more nipa (palm) leaves

loans.name: Ayesha

texts.en: Like many women, it was financial constraints that played a potent factor in encouraging Ayesha to approach Kashf Foundation in search of a loan. Ayesha is a 58-year-old married woman and a mother of two children. In order to support her husband in taking care of the family, she began the business of milk selling. She is known in her town for providing good-quality milk. She owns buffaloes for milking. She is happily supporting her family with the income generated. She has requested a loan of 60,000 PKR to purchase another buffalo to increase her sales to generate more income to cover her daily expenses.

loans.use: to purchase another buffalo to increase her sales to generate more income to cover her daily expenses.

loans.name: Nawab

texts.en: Nawab is a 34-year-old married lady who has been running a small general store in her community for many years.  She offers a variety of grocery items at a reasonable price and has retained many customers who regularly shop at her store. Nawab makes enough to provide for her family. To fully stock her store, she requested a loan of 50,000 PKR. She will use this to buy rice, sugar, grains, biscuits, oil and flour from the market at lower rates to make her stock available to her customers. In this way, she would be able to consistently meet the increasing demand. Nawab wishes to utilize part of her revenues on providing a good-quality life to her family members.

loans.use: to buy rice, sugar, grains, biscuits, oil and flour from the market at lower rates to make her stock available to her customers.

loans.name: Khalida Bibi

texts.en:
Khalida is a 43-year-old widowed woman living in the area of Multan, Pakistan. She is a mother of four children. She is responsible to fulfill the needs of the entire family. She has been running an embroidery business for 15 years to meet the family’s expenses. Her embroidery business is very famous in the colony, and that is the reason her business runs well. Due to good relations, her business has increased. She is a brave woman.

Khalida buys materials such as hand-embroidery kits, ribbon, needles and an embroidery machine from the market. Another person handles her transactions with her customers. She has decided that she would like to sell her embroidery items directly in the market, so that she can earn a better profit for her family. She has become an expert in the embroidery business. So, Khalida requested a loan so she will be able to buy raw materials from the market.

She wants to meet the demand for bridal dresses. That is why she wants to buy threads, fancy cloths, sequins, and pearls of various colours in advance, to have in stock. She requires some capital to buy the desired items but does not have sufficient cash on hand.

Therefore, Khalida humbly requested a loan from BRAC Pakistan. Through this loan, she will be able to buy the threads, fancy cloths, sequins, and pearls of various colours that she needs. Khalida and her family will be thankful to Kiva, lenders and field partner BRAC Pakistan for helping them by funding this loan to improve their living standard.

loans.use: To buy embroidery raw materials for herself.

loans.name: Gloria Maria

texts.es: Gloria tiene 33 años de edad, es de estado civil divorciada, ella se dedica a la elaboración de prendas de vestir ella es una persona tranquila y muy responsable con su trabajo, ya que a esta actividad que se dedica más de 10 años, esta actividad se ha vuelto una gran fuente de trabajo, gracias a este negocio ella ha podido salir adelante, con sus dos hijas Paula de 10 años y Karen de 8 años de edad, solicita el crédito para poder invertir en mas materiales y asi poder crecer en su negocio.
texts.en: Gloria is 33 years old. She is divorced and she makes clothing. She is a peaceful person and is very responsible at her job, as she has been doing this work for 10 years. This activity has become a great source of work and thanks to the business she has been able to get ahead with her two daughters, Paula, aged 10, and Karen, aged 8. She is asking for the loan to invest in more materials so she can grow her business.

loans.use: to invest in her seamstress business.

loans.name: Jose Adrian

texts.es: José, de 39 años de edad, está casado, vive con su esposa y sus 2 hijos en un municipio de Lempira. Él tiene 10 años de dedicarse al cultivo y venta de café, el cual lo vende en pergamino y es de buena calidad, su producción es vendida en la misma zona a intermediarios. Él solicita la cantidad de 20,000 Lempiras que invertirá en la compra de fertilizantes y el pago de trabajadores para brindar limpieza y corte de café. Su objetivo es brindar más asistencia para obtener mayor producción e ingresos. Su sueño es plantar una finca más grande y de allí poder mejorar la calidad de vida con su familia.
texts.en: José is 39 years old and is married. He lives with his wife and two children in the municipality of Lempira. He has been growing and selling coffee for ten years. He sells parchment coffee of good quality. His production is sold in the area to middlemen. He is requesting the amount of 20,000 HNL that he will invest in buying fertilizer and paying workers to provide clearing and harvesting of his coffee. His objective is to provide more care to obtain higher production and income. His dream is to plant a larger plantation and doing this be able to improve the quality of living of his family.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and pay workers to clean and harvest his coffee crops.

loans.name: Nelly

texts.en:
Nelly is 42 years old and has two children. With two children in school, Nelly works very hard to provide for them.

Nelly runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 7,000 loan through NWTF to buy additional items to sell like canned goods, junk foods, eggs, etc.

Nelly has been in this business for four years and sells a variety of items such as dishwashing liquid, fabric conditioner, junk foods, biscuits, etc.

In the future, Nelly would like to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy additional items to sell like canned goods, junk foods, eggs, etc.

loans.name: Isidra

texts.en:
Isidra is a married woman with three children. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. Isidra is 56 years old and has two children who are currently in school.

Isidra has a roasted-pig business in the Philippines. Isidra requested a PHP 18,000 loan amount through NWTF to buy ingredients for her food production business.

Isidra has been in this business for five years. She would like to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy ingredients for her food production business

loans.name: Meena

texts.en: Meena was living a tough life some years ago; it was very difficult to bear her household expenditures. She is a 58-year-old married woman who has been running a business of milk selling for many years with the help of her husband. She has buffaloes for milking purposes. She sells the milk in her area. Now her business is doing well enough to pay for her family’s expenses. She has four children. She is a dedicated mother and wants the best for her children. She has taken many loans from Kashf Foundation. Currently, she has requested a loan of 40,000 PKR to purchase one more buffalo. This will increase milk sales so that she can earn a good amount of income to fulfill her dream of providing better living conditions for her children.

loans.use: to purchase one more buffalo. This will increase milk sales so that she can earn a good amount of income to fulfill her dream of providing better living conditions for her children.

loans.name: Anwar

texts.en:
Financial constraints, alongside the want for a better life and good quality education for her eight children, are only a few but valuable factors that encouraged our Anwar to start her business selling animals by taking a loan from Kashf Foundation.

Anwar is a 39-year-old married woman. She buys animals (baby goats and calves) at low prices, brings them up and then sells them out in the market at higher prices. She makes enough through her business to contribute to the family's income. She also sells milk to generate an extra amount of income.

She needs to improve her business to bear her household expenses. For this reason, she contacted Kashf Foundation and applied for a loan of PKR 45,000 to purchase more animals to inflate her sales. She is very experienced and has good contacts in the market. With this loan, she will definitely expand her business and income level.

loans.use: to purchase more animals to increase her sales.

loans.name: Nazeeran

texts.en:
Nazeeran is 59-year-old vigorous, married woman. She has had a business of hand-embroidery for many years. She knows the art of making beautiful embroidery patterns with beads and pearls. She is zealous about her work, and client demand is strong. But business challenges, combined with family expenditures, frustrate her nearly every day. Her husband does not earn enough to support his family well alone. Nazeeran’s embroidery patterns are very popular on her street and she is the best earning resource in her household.

She is a mother of three children. She wants to grow her business, so she requested a loan of 45,000 PKR to buy raw materials such as thread, sequins and pearls in large quantities to meet the increasing demand time after time. She hopes to gain more profits to help in fulfilling her dream of opening her own shop in the market to display her work.

loans.use: to buy raw materials such as thread, sequins and pearls in large quantities to meet the increasing demand time after time

loans.name: Aminjon

texts.ru: Аминчон начинающий бизнесмен. Ему 28 года. Он в жизни хочет стать успешным человеком, но уезжать из Родины в Российскую Федерацию на заработки как его отец и многие мужчины не хочет, потому что понимается, что он не смог получить хорошее образование и ему будет тяжело в чужой стране найти хорошую работу. К тому же нему надо присматривать за своими родными и сыном. Аминчон решил начать собственный бизнес, в сфере купли продажи скотов на родном районе, под названием Фархор. Он обратился за кредитом, чтобы на эти деньги купить скотин, корм и достроить коровник. Благодаря кредиту, он может найти источник заработка, кормить семью и дать образование сыну. Аминчон надеется на Вас.
texts.en:
Aminjon is an aspiring entrepreneur.  He is 28 years old and he wants to become successful in life.  However he doesn't want to leave his home country and look for work in Russia like his father and many other men, because he knows that he wouldn't be able to receive a quality education and that he might have a hard time finding a good job abroad.  Besides, he needs to take care of his relatives and of his son.

Aminjon has therefore decided to start his own business; he wants to start buying and selling livestock in his native district of Farkhor.  He has requested a loan to buy some livestock, some animal feed, and to finish building a barn.  This  loan will allow him to have a source of income, to feed his family and to give an education to his son. Aminjon places his hopes on your support.

loans.use: to start a new business, to buy cattle and finish building a barn.
